22420.description: A distant cousin to the flax found in the highlands of Coerthas, the stalk of this fibrous plant is used to create a yarn known in Hingashi as “true linen.”

22421.name: Ground Sloth Pelt
22421.description: The coarse, bristly hide of a giant ground sloth.

22422.name: Grade 3 Reisui of Strength
22422.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to strength, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

22423.name: Grade 3 Reisui of Dexterity
22423.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to dexterity, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

22424.name: Grade 3 Reisui of Vitality
22424.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to vitality, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

22425.name: Grade 3 Reisui of Intelligence
22425.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to intelligence, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

22426.name: Grade 3 Reisui of Mind
22426.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to mind, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

22430.name: Ground Sloth Leather
22430.description: A large piece of cured ground sloth hide.

22432.name: Tako-yaki
22432.description: Bite-sized balls of fried pastry each containing a solitary chunk of tender octopus in their gooey, molten centers. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22433.name: Futo-maki Roll
22433.description: Crisp dried seaweed and sweet vinegared rice rolled around a smorgasbord of sweet and savory fillings. Thought to bring fortune...or at least end hunger. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22434.name: Oden
22434.description: A veritable hodgepodge of vegetables, meats, and seafood simmered in a light fish broth for literally days upon end. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22435.name: Dzo Steak
22435.description: A thick cut of dzo sirloin sprinkled with salt and seared to perfection. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22436.name: Crimson Cider
22436.description: Official beverage of both the Ala Mhigan Resistance and the Doman Liberation Front, or so cider brewers would have you believe. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22437.name: Sauteed Green Leeks
22437.description: A simple dish of thick, meaty leeks sautéed with garlic. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22438.name: Dzo Sirloin
22438.description: A remarkably lean slice of red meat from the back of a steppe-grazing dzo.

22439.name: Doman Rice
22439.description: A hardy hybrid of sweet, sticky rice perfected by Far Eastern farmers after countless generations of cross-pollination. Known in Yanxia as “Doman Sunrise.”

22440.name: Hedge Partition
22440.description: A low-growing hedge, oft used to create natural barriers around homes.

22441.name: Crimson Coral
22441.description: A deep red piece of rare coral native to the Ruby Sea.

22442.name: Colossus Slab
22442.description: This piece of carved stone appears to have once been part of a large statue.

22445.name: Tofu Pancakes
22445.description: The adding of tofu results in a light, fluffy pancake that is cherished by families across Doma. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

22446.name: Honeydew Honey
22446.description: Instead of from collecting pollen, this deep, flavorful variety of honey is made from bees collecting honeydew excreted by the aphids that gather on the flowers.

22447.name: Grade 2 Infusion of Strength
22447.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases strength, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

22448.name: Grade 2 Infusion of Dexterity
22448.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases dexterity, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

22449.name: Grade 2 Infusion of Vitality
22449.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases vitality, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

22450.name: Grade 2 Infusion of Intelligence
22450.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases intelligence, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

22451.name: Grade 2 Infusion of Mind
22451.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases mind, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

22463.name: Holy Linen
22463.description: This length of true linen has been blessed by one or more religious figures of varying holiness.

22464.name: Ala Mhigan Weave
22464.description: Cloth woven using traditional techniques that date back to the Fifth Astral Era.

22465.name: Babbling Brook Orchestrion Roll
22465.description: Music roll of the soothing babbling of a countryside brook. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22466.name: Bustling Boulevard Orchestrion Roll
22466.description: Music roll of the soothing bustle of a busy boulevard. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22467.name: Temple Bell Orchestrion Roll
22467.description: Music roll of the soothing toll of a temple bell. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22468.name: Chapel Bell Orchestrion Roll
22468.description: Music roll of the soothing toll of a chapel bell. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22473.name: Rival Wings Orchestrion Roll
22473.description: Music roll for Rival Wings. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22474.name: Crimson Sunset Orchestrion Roll
22474.description: Music roll for Crimson Sunset. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22475.name: Westward Tide Orchestrion Roll
22475.description: Music roll for Westward Tide. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22476.name: A Mother's Pride Orchestrion Roll
22476.description: Music roll for A Mother's Pride. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22477.name: He Rises Above Orchestrion Roll
22477.description: Music roll for He Rises Above. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22479.name: Wicked Winds Whisper Orchestrion Roll
22479.description: Music roll for Wicked Winds Whisper. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22480.name: No Quarter Orchestrion Roll
22480.description: Music roll for No Quarter. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22481.name: Down Where Daemons Dwell Orchestrion Roll
22481.description: Music roll for Down Where Daemons Dwell. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22482.name: Unbreakable (Duality) Orchestrion Roll
22482.description: Music roll for Unbreakable (Duality). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22483.name: Their Deadly Mission Orchestrion Roll
22483.description: Music roll for Their Deadly Mission. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22484.name: Liberty or Death Orchestrion Roll
22484.description: Music roll for Liberty or Death. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22486.name: Answer on High Orchestrion Roll
22486.description: Music roll for Answer on High. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22487.name: Amatsu Kaze Orchestrion Roll
22487.description: Music roll for Amatsu Kaze. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22489.name: Shattered Orchestrion Roll
22489.description: Music roll for Shattered. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22490.name: Fragments of Forever Orchestrion Roll
22490.description: Music roll for Fragments of Forever. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22492.name: Faded Copy of the Jade Stoa
22492.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing full scores for Answer on High and Amatsu Kaze.

22493.name: True Linen
22493.description: Several yalms of undyed true linen wrapped around a short distaff.

22495.name: Cracked Hanya Mask
22495.description: This gruesome visage will not be driving any evil spirits from the hearth in its current state.

22520.name: Dodo Message Book Stand
22520.description:
A message book stand designed in the likeness of a dodo. Not likely to regurgitate on whatever you place upon it.

※One per estate only.

22526.name: Whale-class Bow
22526.description: Comprising the front end of a whale-class submersible, this bow offers special protection against undersea volcanic eruptions. Theoretically.

22527.name: Whale-class Bridge
22527.description: Comprising the top of a whale-class submersible, this bridge improves on the depth rating of other models, allowing submersibles equipped with it to delve even further.

22528.name: Whale-class Pressure Hull
22528.description: Comprising the center of a whale-class submersible, this ovoid hull is equipped with two different auxiliary propellers for superior maneuverability.

22529.name: Whale-class Stern
22529.description: Comprising the rear end of a whale-class submersible, this stern is made with heavy-duty screws to ensure stability under pressure.

22530.name: Solid-brick Interior Wall
22530.description: An interior wall of rustic red brick.

22531.name: Unfinished Wood Flooring
22531.description: Natural flooring made of unvarnished wood.

22532.name: Odder Otter Hanging Andon Lamp
22532.description: A festive ceiling lamp with an odder otter motif.

22533.name: Odder Otter Cottage Walls
22533.description:
A set of four walls for those who wish to make their homes a bit odder.

※Can only be used with cottages on small plots of land.

22534.name: Odder Otter House Walls
22534.description:
A set of four walls for those who wish to make their homes somewhat odder.

※Can only be used with houses on medium plots of land.

22535.name: Odder Otter Mansion Walls
22535.description:
A set of four walls for those who wish to make their homes much odder.

※Can only be used with mansions on large plots of land.

22536.name: Merry Mog Bed
22536.description: A large bed with a lively moogle motif.

22537.name: Mellow Mog Lamp
22537.description: A gently glowing lamp depicting a moogle at rest upon his beloved cloud mallows.

22538.name: Odder Otter Dining Table
22538.description: A dining table with an odder otter motif.

22539.name: Odder Otter Screen
22539.description: A screen with an odder otter motif.

22540.name: Odder Otter Chair
22540.description: A chair with an odder otter motif.

22541.name: Odder Otter Wall Lantern
22541.description: A wall lantern with an odder otter motif.

22542.name: Crossed Halberds
22542.description: A wall decoration featuring a shield over crossed halberds.

22543.name: Sewing Baskets
22543.description: Sewing baskets for the ambitious weaver, bursting with more materials than could ever conceivably be necessary.

22545.name: Stuffed Tsukuyomi
22545.description:
Like the real Tsukuyomi, she looks as if she needs a hug. Unlike the real Tsukuyomi, she will not slice you in half if you try.

※One per estate only.

22548.name: Disordered Wardrobe
22548.description: A wardrobe so cluttered one might fear a burglar's in their midst.

22549.name: Laundry Basket
22549.description: A basket realistically filled past the brim with soiled habiliments.

22550.name: Leather Bags
22550.description: No one need know that these bags are not real Fen-Ylls.

22551.name: Cozy Leather Shoes
22551.description: Perfect for busy adventurers, this decorative set of shoes in assorted sizes will give even the most neglected home that lived-in look.

22552.name: Assorted Candles
22552.description: Whatever you enshrine with these many, many candles is your business.

22553.name: Glade Bachelor's Chest
22553.description: A compact chest of drawers designed to complement glade residences.

22554.name: Portable Stepladder
22554.description: A versatile stepladder, perfect for ambitious homeowners attempting renovations. That or ambitious Lalafells attempting to reach the dessert cupboard.

22555.name: Glade Partition Door
22555.description: A dark wood partition with a built-in door designed to complement glade residences.

22556.name: Oasis Partition Door
22556.description: A partition with a built-in door designed to complement oasis residences.

22557.name: Wine Glass
22557.description: Merely placing this glass in any home adds a veneer of sophistication.

22558.name: Bar Counter
22558.description: That a homeowner in possession of a bar counter must be in desperate want of company is a truth acknowledged universally.

22559.name: Bar Stool
22559.description: A stool to sit on, and tumble off of.

22560.name: Trouser Hanger
22560.description: Do not even consider hanging a jerkin on a trouser hanger.

22561.name: Chainmail Hanger
22561.description: No matter how identical this hanger may be to a dress hanger, to hang anything but chainmail on it would be blasphemy.

22562.name: Sumptuous Dimension Castle Vase
22562.description: A vase of colorful flowers just as described in the pages of an ancient tome.

22563.name: Imposing Dimension Castle Vase
22563.description: A towering vase just as described in the pages of an ancient tome.

22568.name: Miniature Iloh
22568.description: A charming scale model of a Xaela encampment.

22569.name: Southern Kitchen
22569.description: A lavishly carved freestanding stone kitchen.

22570.name: Hingan Cleaning Supplies
22570.description: A broom and bucket of the sort commonly used in Hingan homes.

22574.name: Jellyfish Lamp
22574.description: A lamp that resembles a luminous jellyfish in every way─except the painful ones.

22579.name: Odder Otter Bench
22579.description: A bench with an odder otter motif.

22580.name: Picnic Set
22580.description: A picnic basket packed with a sumptuous feast. Quilted blanket included. Antling repellent not.

22581.name: Miniature Heaven-on-High
22581.description: Relive the adventure that you have relived over and over again...over again!

22582.name: Odder Otter Andon Lamp
22582.description: An outdoor lamp with an odder otter motif.

22589.name: Dahlia Bulbs
22589.description:
Though commonly referred to as “bulbs,” these nascent dahlia plants are more akin to tubers. Despite currently looking like stunted popotoes, they will grow to produce lovely flowers.

※For use in planters.

22590.name: Red Dahlias
22590.description:
A bunch of red dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22591.name: Blue Dahlias
22591.description:
A bunch of blue dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22592.name: Yellow Dahlias
22592.description:
A bunch of yellow dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22593.name: Green Dahlias
22593.description:
A bunch of green dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22594.name: Orange Dahlias
22594.description:
A bunch of orange dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22595.name: Purple Dahlias
22595.description:
A bunch of purple dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22596.name: White Dahlias
22596.description:
A bunch of white dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22597.name: Black Dahlias
22597.description:
A bunch of black dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22598.name: Rainbow Dahlias
22598.description:
A bunch of multicolored dahlias, selectively fertilized to achieve a variety of vibrant colors.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

22603.name: Cornerstone of the New World - Astera Orchestrion Roll
22603.description: Music roll for Cornerstone of the New World - Astera. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22604.name: Savage of the Ancient Forest Orchestrion Roll
22604.description: Music roll for Savage of the Ancient Forest. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

22605.name: Proof of a Hero - Monster Hunter: World Version Orchestrion Roll
22605.description: Music roll for Proof of a Hero - Monster Hunter: World Version. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23023.name: Dodo Horn
23023.description: This horn of bone emits a dissonant honk that, for no readily apparent reason, summons a dodo to your side.

23027.name: Copycat Bulb
23027.description:
The only companion you need if you want no other companions.

Use item to acquire the copycat bulb minion.

23028.name: Wind-up Tarutaru
23028.description:
Remarks relating to a certain people's stature and the diminutiveness thereof are best kept to oneself.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Tarutaru minion.

23030.name: Wind-up Sadu
23030.description:
Will most likely not call any of your companions a stunted chuluu.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Sadu minion.

23032.name: Monkey King
23032.description:
King of monkeys. Equal of heaven. Inspirer of “awww.”

Use item to acquire the monkey king minion.

23036.name: Wind-up Zhloe
23036.description:
Cannot thank you enough, but will certainly try.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Zhloe minion.

23037.name: Lunar Barding
23037.description: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble Tsukuyomi, Lady of the Moon.

23054.name: Shrieker
23054.description:
Anyone who has seen far enough into the maw of a shrieker to confirm whether its rows of teeth line not just one, but two pharyngeal jaws could not have lived to tell the tale, so the anatomy of this cryptid remains shrouded in mystery.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 4 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

23055.name: White Goldfish
23055.description:
A freshwater fish unattuned to any particular element.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

23056.name: Firelight Goldfish
23056.description:
This freshwater fish lacks distinct aetherial balance─a trait that has influenced its coloration.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23057.name: Hookstealer
23057.description:
A king among Abalathian bitterlings, and lord of the waters of upper Mirage Creek.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23058.name: Sapphire Fan
23058.description:
A king among cave killifish, and lord of the waters of Dimwold.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23059.name: The Archbishop
23059.description:
A king among cardinalfish, and lord of the waters of the Comet's Tail.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 2 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

23060.name: Bondsplitter
23060.description:
A king among Enid shrimp, and lord of the waters of Grymm & Enid.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

23061.name: The Undecided
23061.description:
A king among rapids jumpers, and lord of the waters of the Slow Wash.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

23062.name: Diamond-eye
23062.description:
A king among pearl-eyes, and lord of the waters of Loch Seld.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

23063.name: Rising Dragon
23063.description:
A king among hanatatsu, and lord of the waters of Kugane Piers.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

23064.name: The Gambler
23064.description:
A king among striped fugu, and lord of the waters of Shirogane.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23065.name: The Winter Queen
23065.description:
A queen among harutsuge, and lady of the waters of Shoal Rock.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23066.name: Rakshasa
23066.description:
A king among Zekki gators, and lord of the waters of the Isle of Zekki.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

23067.name: Bokuden
23067.description:
A king among samurai fish, and lord of the waters of Doma Castle.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23068.name: Hagoromo Koi
23068.description:
A king among silken koi, and lord of the waters of Plum Spring.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

23069.name: The Word of God
23069.description:
A king among Tao bitterlings, and lord of the waters of Tao Khaal.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23070.name: Yat Khan
23070.description:
A khan among Yat goby, and lord of the waters of the lower Yat Khaal.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

23097.name: Grand Chair
23097.description: An imposing chair with an ornately wrought chocobo motif.

23158.name: Raw Medicinal Materials
23158.description: Assorted materials needed to create the components used in Gyr Abanian remedies.

23159.name: Raw Harpoon Materials
23159.description: Assorted materials needed to create the various components of a harpoon.

23160.name: Raw Cold-weather Gear Materials
23160.description: Assorted materials needed to create the various components of Coerthan cold-weather gear.

23161.name: Raw Sui-no-Sato Special Materials
23161.description: Assorted materials sourced from SuinoSato that are needed to create components for the newly invented SuinoSato Special.

23162.name: Raw Cloud Pearl Materials
23162.description: Assorted materials needed to create the components used in synthesizing a cloud pearl.

23167.name: Super-Potion
23167.description: This concentrated concoction instantly restores a significant amount of HP.

23168.name: Super-Ether
23168.description: Processed via the alchemical extraction of aetheric essence occurring in elemental crystals, the contents of this vial instantly restore a significant amount of MP.

23178.name: Stormsap
23178.description: The chemical composition of this milky violet liquid is unknown, but its color─reminiscent of a thundercloud illuminated by lightning─has given rise to rumors surrounding its origins that have led to the unfortunate electrocution of many a scholar and profiteer alike.

23179.name: Hawk's Eye
23179.description: A blue-grey jewel consisting of many colored layers. When polished, it resembles the piercing eye of a raptor.

23180.name: Hardened Veteran Tree Sap
23180.description: A partially congealed ball of sticky sap extracted from an aged tree.

23181.name: Kingcraft Demimateria
23181.description: A crystallized mass of residual spiritbond energies transferred to an article of weaponry or armor by its exceptionally skilled maker during the crafting process.

23182.name: Duskglow Aethersand
23182.description: The elementally aspected remnants of aetherially reduced matter. This fine sand emits a crepuscular glow independent of ambient light.

23183.name: Hawk's Eye Sand
23183.description: Conversion of the mineral hawk's eye via an alchemical process is the only way to create this incomparably fine sand.

23184.name: Veteran Tree Sap
23184.description: This sap has been reverted from hardened lumps to its original liquid state via an alchemical process.

23185.name: Konpeito
23185.description: Colorful clusters of crystalline sugar─a childhood treat for Hingans and Domans alike. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

23186.name: Banh Xeo
23186.description: A traditional Nagxian dish consisting of meat and vegetables swaddled in a thin shell of crispy fried batter. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

23187.name: Matcha
23187.description: A sophisticatedly bitter infusion prepared by whisking fine-ground tea leaves into piping hot water. Drinking it properly requires such finesse that Hingashi is home to many a school focused solely on perfecting the art. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

23188.name: Ema Datshi
23188.description: Rich, oozing cheese complements the seething bite of inferno-hot peppers in this Azim Steppe staple. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

23209.name: Celestial Kimono Remnant
23209.description: This length of fabric was cut from the Lady of the Moon's own kimono.

23213.name: Wooden Hakutaku Eye
23213.description: A ligneous eyeball of the legendary Hakutaku. Rumor has it that its sight will be restored when immersed in blood.

23214.name: Burning Hakutaku Eye
23214.description: A fiery eyeball of the legendary Hakutaku. Rumor has it that its sight will be restored when immersed in blood.

23215.name: Earthen Hakutaku Eye
23215.description: A soiled eyeball of the legendary Hakutaku. Rumor has it that its sight will be restored when immersed in blood.

23216.name: Golden Hakutaku Eye
23216.description: A lustrous eyeball of the legendary Hakutaku. Rumor has it that its sight will be restored when immersed in blood.

23217.name: Damp Hakutaku Eye
23217.description: A dripping eyeball of the legendary Hakutaku. Rumor has it that its sight will be restored when immersed in blood.

23218.name: Hakutaku Eye Cluster
23218.description: A cluster of eyes from a legendary beast, the Hakutaku. The eyes are slowly yet steadily growing in number as they divide via mitosis.

23221.name: Yanxian Verbena
23221.description: A hearty plant that can proliferate on nearly any surface, including tree trunks. Its leaves release a pleasant scent when touched.

23222.name: Marine Wax Ester
23222.description: A saturated wax ester harvested from the fathomless abyss.

23227.name: Empyrean Pine Log
23227.description: Though this was perhaps once a run-of-the-mill cutting of timber, it has since been warped in the oddest of ways by exposure to the powerful magicks of HeavenonHigh.

23228.name: Empyrean Clay
23228.description: Though this was perhaps once unremarkable mud, it has since been warped in the oddest of ways by exposure to the powerful magicks of HeavenonHigh.

23229.name: Stuffed Happy Bunny
23229.description: This plush rabbit is so realistic that it is rumored to bring fortune, just like a real happy bunny would, to all who come across it. All except those who are prone to allergies, anyway.

23230.name: Journeyman Salvager Permit
23230.description:
This permit allows the hiring of journeyman salvagers on the estate.

※Private chambers (apartments), cottages, houses, and mansions can host 4, 6, 8, and 10 vendors, respectively.

23315.name: Ambient Wind Chime Orchestrion Roll
23315.description: Music roll of the soothing tintinnabulation of an oriental wind chime. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23316.name: Ambient Abyss Orchestrion Roll
23316.description: Music roll of the soothing sound of the cobalt deep. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23317.name: Victory or Death Orchestrion Roll
23317.description: Music roll for Victory or Death. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23318.name: Far East of Eorzea Orchestrion Roll
23318.description: Music roll for Far East of Eorzea. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23319.name: Parting Ways Orchestrion Roll
23319.description: Music roll for Parting Ways. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23321.name: The Ancient City Orchestrion Roll
23321.description: Music roll for The Ancient City. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23322.name: Gates of the Moon Orchestrion Roll
23322.description: Music roll for Gates of the Moon. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23323.name: Earth, Wind, and Water Orchestrion Roll
23323.description: Music roll for Earth, Wind, and Water. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23324.name: Black and White Orchestrion Roll
23324.description: Music roll for Black and White. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23328.name: The Mystery of Giruvegan Orchestrion Roll
23328.description: Music roll for The Mystery of Giruvegan. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23329.name: Apoplexy Orchestrion Roll
23329.description: Music roll for Apoplexy. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23330.name: Flash of Steel Orchestrion Roll
23330.description: Music roll for Flash of Steel. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23331.name: Nightbloom Orchestrion Roll
23331.description: Music roll for Nightbloom. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23332.name: Wayward Daughter Orchestrion Roll
23332.description: Music roll for Wayward Daughter. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

23336.name: Faded Copy of Under the Moonlight
23336.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing full scores for Nightbloom and Wayward Daughter.

23337.name: Faded Copy of Ambient Abyss
23337.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing a full panoply of the ambient melodies one might expect to hear under the sea.

23342.name: Behemoth Pelt
23342.description: The no longer glossy, yet still massive, coat of a behemoth.

23345.name: Lizard Tail
23345.description: In defiance of all logic and natural laws, this tail is still partly alive, and twitches occasionally. Delightful.

23346.name: Reishi Mushroom
23346.description: This rare mushroom is known for its high nutritive content...and not much else.

23347.name: Pagos Spring Water
23347.description: Clear, cool water taken from a spring in the Pagos region of Eureka.

23348.name: Pagos Sage
23348.description: A fragrant herb that can be used medicinally or to add a pleasant flavor to cuisine. The variety found in Pagos is notably crisp and hearty.

23349.name: Potion of Harmony
23349.description: This innovative alchemical concoction assists the body in acclimating to Eureka's discordant aetheric environment. Elemental EXP Bonus: +10% Duration: 60m (if HQ, 90m) ※Only available for use in the Forbidden Land, Eureka.

23366.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Insufficient Petticoats
23366.description: An illustrated manual of how not to conduct oneself while trapped on the balcony with an indefatigable admirer in the evening hours. Use to learn the /shiver emote.

23369.name: Modern Aesthetics - Gyr Abanian Plait
23369.description:
The realm's premier publication on beauty and fashion, this specific copy of Modern Aesthetics covers, in detail, techniques on braiding hair in the traditional Ala Mhigan fashion─a style that was popular until the imperial invasion.

Use to unlock a new hairstyle at the aesthetician.
Unavailable to Viera and Hrothgar.

23375.name: Cloth Cointe Quaint
23375.description: No real lady of fashion would be caught dead wearing a skirt or─heavens forfend─a dress made from anything else.

23376.name: Leather Cointe Quaint
23376.description: No real lady of fashion would be caught dead wearing a hat or─heavens forfend─shoes made from anything else.

23377.name: Boutique Batiste
23377.description: No real gentleman of fashion would be caught dead wearing a shirt or─heavens forfend─pants made from anything else.

23378.name: Boutique Boarded Leather
23378.description: No real gentleman of fashion would be caught dead wearing a hat or─heavens forfend─shoes made from anything else.

23846.name: Mannequin
23846.description:
Once the nightmare of shopkeeps alone, highly detailed models such as this one have gained popularity amongst adventurers as means of selling unneeded accoutrements, displaying hard-won ensembles, and unnerving unsuspecting visitors.

※Private chambers (apartments), cottages, houses, and mansions can hold 4, 6, 8, and 10 facilities, respectively.

23862.name: Pot of Cream Stew
23862.description: A warming dish of familiar vegetables simmered for bells in a rich sauce of thickened milk. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Spell Speed Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +4% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +2 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

23863.name: Suzaku Wall Hanging
23863.description: An elegant relief depicting one of the Four Lords, alive with dancing flame.

23874.name: Redoubtable Rolanberry Tart
23874.description: A flaky-crusted tart with a slight acidity that complements its pleasant sweetness, so enormous that it should only be served at parties. Of course, sometimes a party can be just one hungry homeowner and a clean fork. Or a dirty one. It doesn't really matter. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Tenacity Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +4% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +2 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

23875.name: Crystal Boule
23875.description: A mounted sample of the luminous euhedral crystals that grow uninhibited on the sea floor.

23876.name: Gridanian Bouquet
23876.description: An elegant bouquet for romantic occasions, each bloom painstakingly selected by the florist Tanie.

23877.name: Imitation Shuttered Window
23877.description: Unlike those attached to non-imitation windows, these louvered shutters will ever remain pristine as they add a touch of the rustic to your interior décor.

23878.name: Little Chef's Playset
23878.description: This set for aspiring culinary artists includes soft, child-safe replicas of everything one might need in the kitchen, including a helpful Miqo'te poissonnier.

23879.name: Wooden Showcase
23879.description: Spare a thought for the poor carpenter who toiled to make this furnishing both simple and elegant as you inevitably pile as many objects as physically possible atop its shelves.

23880.name: Unfinished Shawl
23880.description: A knitter's work is never done. In this case, literally.

23881.name: Adventuring Pack
23881.description: An adventurer never leaves home without his compass! And his waterskin. And his lantern. And his potions. And his telescope. And his books. Really, an adventurer needs to learn to pack a bit lighter.

23882.name: Spice Rack
23882.description: This storage unit is packed with enough spices, herbs, oils, and other ingredients to satisfy even the most dedicated culinarian.

23883.name: Bread Rack
23883.description: One could raise an entire army of ducks with this much bread. Hypothetically.

23884.name: Mahogany Bunk Bed
23884.description: For weary adults who have spent overmuch on alligator pears and cannot afford to live alone.

23885.name: Handbasket
23885.description: A large and lovely woven vessel. Be advised that if a Lalafell fits in it, she will sits in it.

23888.name: Glass Jars
23888.description: Opaque vessels of assorted size, perhaps containing flour and sugar. Or cookies. Or bugs.

23889.name: Wooden Plates
23889.description: Dishes for those with simple tastes and many friends.

23890.name: Wooden Cups
23890.description: A half-dozen goblets for fancy parties. Cupbearer not included.

23891.name: Mounted Plate Rack
23891.description: A sturdy wooden display. For the good plates, not the food plates.

23892.name: Verdant Partition
23892.description: A lush partition covered floor-to-ceiling in ivy and assorted ferns.

23893.name: Bathroom Floor Tiles
23893.description: A large square of cerulean tiling with a built-in drain.

23894.name: Bathroom Wall Tiles
23894.description: A square of tiling used to prevent walls from becoming so waterlogged that the house slowly but surely collapses in on itself.

23896.name: Sofa Cushions
23896.description: Does one truly require a sofa if he has this many pillows?

23897.name: Birdbath
23897.description: An elegant two-tiered water feature. Perhaps doubting that potential purchasers would be patient enough to wait for real ones to appear, the sculptor helpfully attached model birds as well.

23898.name: Garden Gravel
23898.description: Myriad tiny rocks that await your landscaping pleasure.

23899.name: Brick Garden Circle
23899.description: All these squares make a circle.

23900.name: Carpeting
23900.description: Durable yet fuzzy loop carpet with a checkerboard pattern.

23901.name: Divine Chandelier
23901.description: A contemporary light fixture designed with the Twelve as its primary theme.

23902.name: Unfinished Interior Wall
23902.description: An interior wall of pale unvarnished wood.

23903.name: Coelacanth-class Bow
23903.description: Comprising the front end of a coelacanth-class submersible, this streamlined bow is designed to allow a vessel to reach greater speeds underwater.

23904.name: Coelacanth-class Bridge
23904.description: Comprising the top of a coelacanth-class submersible, this bridge is expansive and equipped with amenities to enable longer voyages.

23905.name: Coelacanth-class Pressure Hull
23905.description: Comprising the center of a coelacanth-class submersible, this ovoid hull is designed to be resilient against external water pressure and thereby raises maximum operating depth.

23906.name: Coelacanth-class Stern
23906.description: Comprising the rear end of a coelacanth-class submersible, this stern includes a hydrodynamic rudder for optimal lateral maneuverability.

23989.name: Scarlet Peacock
23989.description:
Prettier than your average peacock, and several times as flammable.

Use item to acquire the scarlet peacock minion.

23998.name: Mudpie
23998.description:
At last, portable filth.

Use item to acquire the mudpie minion.

24000.name: Wind-up Elvaan
24000.description:
Remarks relating to a certain people's perpetually dour facial expressions are best kept to oneself.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Elvaan minion.

24001.name: Dhalmel Calf
24001.description:
Oddly short yet alarmingly tall.

Use item to acquire the dhalmel calf minion.

24002.name: Capybara Pup
24002.description:
Loves bath time, and you.

Use item to acquire the capybara pup minion.

24003.name: Scarlet Tailfeather
24003.description: A fiery red plume that previously adorned the auspice Suzaku.

24007.name: Conceptual Logogram
24007.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a novice's knowledge of his art─or perhaps not.

24008.name: Fundamental Logogram
24008.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a journeyman's knowledge of his art.

24009.name: Curative Logogram
24009.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a master's knowledge of healing arts.

24010.name: Offensive Logogram
24010.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a master's knowledge of destructive arts.

24011.name: Protective Logogram
24011.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a master's knowledge of chivalrous arts.

24012.name: Tactical Logogram
24012.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a master's knowledge of logistical arts.

24013.name: Mitigative Logogram
24013.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a master's knowledge of defensive arts.

24014.name: Inimical Logogram
24014.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains a master's knowledge of enfeebling arts.

24143.name: Suzaku Barding
24143.description: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble the Far Eastern auspice Suzaku.

24144.name: Samurai Barding
24144.description: Chocobo barding designed to pair well with traditional samurai garb.

24165.name: Arum Bulbs
24165.description:
Bulbs such as these are the most efficient means of cultivating arums, and thus a must-have for busy hostesses needing to prepare decorative centerpieces or significant volumes of poison in a hurry.

※For use in planters.

24166.name: Red Arums
24166.description:
A bunch of red arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24167.name: Blue Arums
24167.description:
A bunch of blue arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24168.name: Yellow Arums
24168.description:
A bunch of yellow arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24169.name: Green Arums
24169.description:
A bunch of green arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24170.name: Orange Arums
24170.description:
A bunch of orange arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24171.name: Purple Arums
24171.description:
A bunch of purple arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24172.name: White Arums
24172.description:
A bunch of white arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24173.name: Black Arums
24173.description:
A bunch of black arums, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24174.name: Rainbow Arums
24174.description:
A bunch of multicolored aurums, selectively fertilized to achieve a variety of vibrant colors.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24203.name: Indigo Prismfish
24203.description:
An elementally aspected, elegantly colored, and vanishingly rare cousin to the common carp.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24204.name: Green Prismfish
24204.description:
Due to its shockingly bright coloration, this wind-aspected fish is oft sought after for display in garden ponds, but almost never for consumption.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24205.name: Watcher Catfish
24205.description:
A king among electric catfish, and lord of the waters of Rhalgr's Reach.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24206.name: Bloodtail Zombie
24206.description:
A king among redtails, and lord of the waters of the Outer Fist.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24207.name: Hardhead Trout
24207.description:
A king among steelhead trout, and lord of the waters of Timmon Beck.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24208.name: Downstream Loach
24208.description:
A king among greenstream loach, and lord of the waters of the Velodyna River.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24209.name: Corpse Chub
24209.description:
A king among mirage chubs, and lord of the waters of Mirage Creek.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24210.name: The Last Tear
24210.description:
A king among Abalathian salamanders, and lord of the waters of Heather Falls.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24211.name: Hemon
24211.description:
A king among peeping pisces, and lord of the waters of the Bull's Bath.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24212.name: Moksha
24212.description:
A king among meditators, and lord of the waters of the Ephor.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24213.name: Princess Killifish
24213.description:
A princess─obviously─among rainbow killifish, and lady of the waters of the Silver Canal.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24214.name: Ku'er
24214.description:
A king among coeurl snake eels, and lord of the waters of the Ruby Price.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24215.name: Argonautica
24215.description:
A king among blackfin snake eels, and lord of the waters of Onokoro.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24216.name: Hagoromo Bijin
24216.description:
A queen among seraphim, and lady of the western waters of the One River.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24217.name: Duskfish
24217.description:
A khan among hardscales, and lord of the waters of Azim Khaat.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24218.name: Blade Skipper
24218.description:
A khan among dry steppe skippers, and lord of the waters of the upper Yat Khaal.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24219.name: Eldthurs Horn
24219.description: This scorched horn emits a rumbling tone that summons your Eldthurs on burning feet of fire.

24222.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Scholarly Certitude
24222.description: An illustrated manual of how to consult reference materials with an air of gravitas sufficient to impress upon high society the significance of anything you say. Use to learn the /confirm emote.

24224.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Ideal Gossip
24224.description: An illustrated manual of how to put an evening spent amongst the wealthy and powerful to best use. Use to learn the /scheme emote.

24233.name: Modern Aesthetics - Form and Function
24233.description:
The realm's premier publication on beauty and fashion, this specific copy of Modern Aesthetics covers, in detail, techniques for weaving a simple-yet-elegant braided headband.

Use to unlock a new hairstyle at the aesthetician.
Unavailable to Viera and Hrothgar.

24240.name: Gyr Abanian Ore
24240.description: A naturally occurring chunk of lodestone.

24241.name: Evergleam Ore
24241.description: A decent-sized piece of rock containing a rare natural alloy of iron and chromium.

24242.name: Urunday Log
24242.description: A rough-cut log of urunday timber.

24243.name: Yanxian Cotton Boll
24243.description: These whimsical cotton flowers, found only in Yanxia, glimmer faintly like stars in the night.

24244.name: Procoptodon Skin
24244.description: The tough hide of a long-extinct marsupial. Unnervingly, it has somehow survived the test of time.

24245.name: Gyr Abanian Carbon Rods
24245.description: Pure carbon used in the manufacture of specialty steel.

24246.name: Tatara Iron Sand
24246.description: Fine metallic sand consisting of tiny grains of Doman iron, for use specifically in tatara smelting.

24247.name: Stardust Cotton Yarn
24247.description: Glimmering yarn reminiscent of a comet's tail.

24248.name: Gyr Abanian Wax
24248.description: A uniquely Gyr Abanian wax that renders even the most decrepit of hides supple and lustrous when applied as part of the tanning process.

24249.name: High-gloss Urushi
24249.description: This black coating, made from the sap of the lacquer tree, is used to both color and preserve wooden crafts, and can be polished to an extraordinarily glossy sheen.

24250.name: Chigusa Ingot
24250.description: An ingot of tatara-smelted Doman steel.

24251.name: Evergleam Ingot
24251.description: An ingot of smelted evergleam steel.

24253.name: Procoptodon Leather
24253.description: A large piece of cured procoptodon skin.

24254.name: Stardust Cotton Cloth
24254.description: Several yalms of undyed stardust cotton wrapped around a short distaff.

24255.name: Azim Spring Water
24255.description: Water of uncommon clarity sourced from underground springs on the Azim Steppe.

24256.name: Grade 4 Reisui of Strength
24256.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to strength, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

24257.name: Grade 4 Reisui of Dexterity
24257.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to dexterity, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

24258.name: Grade 4 Reisui of Vitality
24258.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to vitality, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

24259.name: Grade 4 Reisui of Intelligence
24259.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to intelligence, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

24260.name: Grade 4 Reisui of Mind
24260.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this Far Eastern potation will, similarly to Eorzean dissolvents, dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to mind, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

24261.name: Grade 3 Infusion of Strength
24261.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases strength, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

24262.name: Grade 3 Infusion of Dexterity
24262.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases dexterity, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

24263.name: Grade 3 Infusion of Vitality
24263.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases vitality, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

24264.name: Grade 3 Infusion of Intelligence
24264.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases intelligence, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

24265.name: Grade 3 Infusion of Mind
24265.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases mind, but for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

24274.name: Rooibos Tea
24274.description: A healthful herbal tea known for its natural mellow sweetness. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24275.name: Ginger Salad
24275.description: A zesty salad that beckons with the aroma of fresh-cut ginger. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24276.name: Laghman
24276.description: A popular comfort food in Othard consisting of thick, chewy noodles and tender minced dzo in a wholesome broth. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24277.name: Imam Bayildi
24277.description: Miniature Doman eggplants stuffed to bursting with juicy marinated vegetables─and enough peppers to knock a trained Fist of Rhalgr monk out cold. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24278.name: Papanasi
24278.description: Thick dough kneaded with soft cheese and fried into a hearty donut, slathered with yet more creamy cheese and a sweet-and-tart berry sauce. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24279.name: Salmon Muffin
24279.description: A buttery Ishgardian muffin topped with the winning combination of succulent fresh salmon, silky sliced alligator pear, and a drizzling of rich cheese. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24280.name: Shakshouka
24280.description: Eggs perfectly poached in a robust, spicy tomato sauce. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24281.name: Rooibos Leaves
24281.description: Red bush leaves whose prickly texture belies the marvelously velvety brew they can be steeped to create.

24282.name: Reunion Cheese
24282.description: A washed-rind cheese made possible by the fortuitous meeting of a Steppe cheesemaker and an itinerant winemaker. It possesses a creamy texture and nutty flavor─though one would be forgiven for being skeptical, given the smell.

24285.name: Lamebrix's Dice
24285.description: A pair of precisely carved dice, subtly weighted for the purpose of cheating in goblin gambling games.

24286.name: Ying-Yang's Tissue
24286.description: An unsightly portion of veined membrane ripped from Ying-Yang's (hopefully vestigial) wings.

24287.name: Skoll's Claw
24287.description: A gleaming, knifelike appendage torn from Skoll's frigid paw.

24290.name: Cradle Orchestrion Roll
24290.description: Music roll for Cradle. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24291.name: Upon the Rocks Orchestrion Roll
24291.description: Music roll for Upon the Rocks. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24292.name: Tricksome Orchestrion Roll
24292.description: Music roll for Tricksome. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24293.name: Beneath Bloodied Banners Orchestrion Roll
24293.description: Music roll for Beneath Bloodied Banners. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24294.name: From Mud Orchestrion Roll
24294.description: Music roll for From Mud. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24295.name: A Land Long Dead Orchestrion Roll
24295.description: Music roll for A Land Long Dead. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24296.name: Sunrise Orchestrion Roll
24296.description: Music roll for Sunrise. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24297.name: Omega Squared Orchestrion Roll
24297.description: Music roll for Omega Squared. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24298.name: Decisions Orchestrion Roll
24298.description: Music roll for Decisions. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24299.name: Final, Not Final Orchestrion Roll
24299.description: Music roll for Final, Not Final. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24300.name: A Battle Decisively Orchestrion Roll
24300.description: Music roll for A Battle Decisively. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24301.name: Dancing Mad - Movement I Orchestrion Roll
24301.description: Music roll for Dancing Mad - Movement I. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24302.name: Dancing Mad - Movement II Orchestrion Roll
24302.description: Music roll for Dancing Mad - Movement II. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24303.name: Dancing Mad - Movement III Orchestrion Roll
24303.description: Music roll for Dancing Mad - Movement III. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24304.name: Dancing Mad - Movement IV Orchestrion Roll
24304.description: Music roll for Dancing Mad - Movement IV. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24305.name: Battle Orchestrion Roll
24305.description: Music roll for Battle. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24306.name: Primogenitor Orchestrion Roll
24306.description: Music roll for Primogenitor. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24307.name: eScape Orchestrion Roll
24307.description: Music roll for eScape. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24308.name: Heartless Orchestrion Roll
24308.description: Music roll for Heartless. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24319.name: Faded Copy of Sunrise
24319.description: Timeworn and slightly singed pages of sheet music containing the full score for Sunrise.

24336.name: Whisperfine Fleece
24336.description: Fine white wool sheared from a breed of sheep prized for the softness of its coat.

24342.name: From the Heavens Orchestrion Roll
24342.description: Music roll for From the Heavens. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

24344.name: Syldra-class Bow
24344.description: Comprising the front end of a Syldra-class submersible, this unique bow resembles the head and neck of a legendary sea dragon.

24345.name: Syldra-class Bridge
24345.description: Comprising the top of a Syldra-class submersible, this bridge is equipped with escape pods to be used in the event of an emergency.

24346.name: Syldra-class Pressure Hull
24346.description: Comprising the center of a Syldra-class submersible, this hydrodynamic finned hull is insusceptible to the pull of even the strongest currents.

24347.name: Syldra-class Stern
24347.description: Comprising the rear end of a Syldra-class submersible, this stern is shaped so as to allow the craft to operate nigh silently, even at top speed.

24348.name: Modified Shark-class Bow
24348.description: Comprising the front end of a shark-class submersible, this redesigned bow doubles as an exceptionally sturdy battering ram for subduing unruly sea creatures.

24349.name: Modified Shark-class Bridge
24349.description: Comprising the top of a shark-class submersible, this bridge has been fully outfitted with any and all equipment that could possibly be necessary for exploring faraway seas.

24350.name: Modified Shark-class Pressure Hull
24350.description: Comprising the center of a shark-class submersible, this multi-walled ovoid hull and its sturdy rudder fins have been redesigned to provide additional stability while maneuvering through the depths.

24351.name: Modified Shark-class Stern
24351.description: Comprising the rear end of a shark-class submersible, this stern contains a high-powered independent engine which propels the craft.

24352.name: Modified Unkiu-class Bow
24352.description: Unkiu-class bows are outfitted with rudder fins, relegated to the stern on most submersibles─and this particular model's have been upgraded for additional durability.

24353.name: Modified Unkiu-class Bridge
24353.description: But recently redesigned by the Onishishu─a collective of skilled Far Eastern craftsmen─this submersible bridge differs dramatically from those built in the West.

24354.name: Modified Unkiu-class Pressure Hull
24354.description: Comprising the center of an unkiu-class submersible, this ovoid hull is multi-walled to stabilize and maintain pressure within. Its supplemental propulsion engines have been upgraded to further increase underwater speed.

24355.name: Modified Unkiu-class Stern
24355.description: Comprising the rear end of an unkiu-class submersible, this stern contains a new model of double propeller engine.

24356.name: Modified Whale-class Bow
24356.description: Comprising the front end of a whale-class submersible, this specially reinforced bow will protect the vessel's interior even should it be caught directly in an undersea volcanic eruption.

24357.name: Modified Whale-class Bridge
24357.description: Comprising the top of a whale-class submersible, this redesigned bridge improves even further on the depth rating of other models, allowing submersibles equipped with it to delve deeper than previously imagined possible.

24358.name: Modified Whale-class Pressure Hull
24358.description: Comprising the center of a whale-class submersible, this ovoid hull is equipped with two reinforced auxiliary propellers for superior maneuverability.

24359.name: Modified Whale-class Stern
24359.description: Comprising the rear end of a whale-class submersible, this stern features a modern, energy-efficient propeller.

24360.name: Modified Coelacanth-class Bow
24360.description: Comprising the front end of a coelacanth-class submersible, this bow has been further streamlined to allow the vessel to reach speeds greater than ever before.

24361.name: Modified Coelacanth-class Bridge
24361.description: Comprising the top of a coelacanth-class submersible, this bridge has been altered to provide even more storage space and equipped with myriad amenities for longer voyages.

24362.name: Modified Coelacanth-class Pressure Hull
24362.description: Comprising the center of a coelacanth-class submersible, this ovoid hull has been redesigned to be even more resilient against external water pressure, thereby further raising maximum operating depth.

24363.name: Modified Coelacanth-class Stern
24363.description: Comprising the rear end of a coelacanth-class submersible, this stern includes a streamlined hydrodynamic rudder that further enhances lateral maneuverability.

24364.name: Modified Syldra-class Bow
24364.description: Comprising the front end of a Syldra-class submersible, this unique bow still resembles the head and neck of a legendary sea dragon, but has been adjusted for greater stability.

24365.name: Modified Syldra-class Bridge
24365.description: Comprising the top of a Syldra-class submersible, this bridge has been redesigned to provide further defense against the dangers of the sea─though it remains equipped with escape pods to be used in the event of an emergency.

24366.name: Modified Syldra-class Pressure Hull
24366.description: Comprising the center of a Syldra-class submersible, this hydrodynamic finned hull has been altered for even greater resistance to the pull of underwater currents.

24367.name: Modified Syldra-class Stern
24367.description: Comprising the rear end of a Syldra-class submersible, this stern has been streamlined so as to allow the craft to operate silently, even at top speed.

24488.name: Paissa Chronometer
24488.description: As if the beastkin's physique simply does not beg to be reimagined as a convenient timepiece.

24489.name: Paint Can
24489.description: The size of this can is indicative of an ambitious home improvement project. The amount of paint remaining suggests that said project has proven more difficult than expected.

24490.name: Emerald Crystal Boule
24490.description: A mounted sample of the luminous green crystals that grow uninhibited on the sea floor.

24491.name: Mirific Mogshelf
24491.description: A charming bookshelf topped with decorative moogles beckoning readers to the myriad worlds that come alive through the written word.

24492.name: Tier 3 Metal Aquarium
24492.description:
A large reinforced glass tank that, when filled with water, can serve as a home for select wavekin caught in the wild. The higher an aquarium's tier, the larger the specimens that can be kept within.
※Private chambers (apartments), cottages, houses, and mansions can host 4, 6, 8, and 10 aquariums, respectively.

24493.name: Tier 4 Metal Aquarium
24493.description:
A massive reinforced glass tank that, when filled with water, can serve as a home for select wavekin caught in the wild. The higher an aquarium's tier, the larger the specimens that can be kept within.
※Private chambers (apartments), cottages, houses, and mansions can host 4, 6, 8, and 10 aquariums, respectively.

24494.name: Travel Paint Set
24494.description: A robust, portable set of art supplies for adventurous artists and artistic adventurers.

24495.name: Seiryu Statuette
24495.description: An elegant carving of the venerable Seiryu. The geomantic orb in its claws reputedly fills one's home with auspicious energies.

24501.name: Small Imitation Window
24501.description: Despite its size─and the minor detail of it not being a real window─this plain would-be portal provides a surprising amount of light.

24502.name: Bag of Booty
24502.description: The shine of the historic coins contained within has been professionally restored with great care. Nevertheless, whether you tuck this bag safely away or wave it about while putting on a terrible faux-pirate accent is entirely up to you.

24503.name: Undersea Spoils
24503.description: Not all that glitters is gold. This is, though.

24504.name: Level Checker Replica
24504.description: A model of an advanced piece of technology described in the pages of a─rather eccentric─ancient tome.

24505.name: Cerulean Crystal Boule
24505.description: A mounted sample of the luminous blue crystals that grow uninhibited on the sea floor.

24506.name: Fat Cat Bank
24506.description: Presumably due to the resemblance in terms of rotundity, the fat cat has overtaken the pig as a popular motif for coin banks. Comes with a matching purse to better facilitate the spending of one's hard-earned savings.

24508.name: Botanist's Dried Herbs
24508.description: An assortment of pleasant-smelling medicinal and culinary herbs verified to be non-toxic. Mostly.

24509.name: Steppe Kitchen
24509.description: This cooking facility was fashioned after those used by the Xaela tribes of the Azim Steppe.

24511.name: Wooden Loft
24511.description: Create the perfect space for sleeping, reading, displays, or enjoying an insurmountable advantage in pillow fights with this wall-mounted platform.

24512.name: Wooden Steps
24512.description: Useful in climbing up to lofts or removing rival heirs.

24513.name: Wooden Beam
24513.description: For use with the wooden loft, though beam enthusiasts are sure to enjoy it regardless.

24514.name: White Rectangular Partition
24514.description: Thus named despite the fact that none would fain expect a blue triangle.

24515.name: Bowl of Oden
24515.description: A heaping bowl of juicy fishcakes, tender daikon, hearty boiled eggs, and other savory ingredients steeped for hours in a warming broth. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Spell Speed Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

24516.name: Fruit Stall
24516.description: A two-tiered unit displaying assorted colorful fruit.

24517.name: Vegetable Stall
24517.description: A large shelf packed with artfully displayed vegetables.

24518.name: Pastry Cupboard
24518.description: Shelves lined with an assortment of pre-plated sweets to sell, share, or...not.

24519.name: Mineral Display
24519.description: Glittering gemstones meticulously arranged atop several tiers of shelving.

24520.name: Fabric Rack
24520.description: A neatly arranged collection of assorted fabrics and spindles of thread for sale.

24521.name: Potion Rack
24521.description: These shelves are packed with enough concoctions and extracts to run a full apothecary and still have some left over for what will doubtless be totally safe and ethical experimentation.

24522.name: Prism Pouch
24522.description: A pouch for many standard-sized prisms, or one extremely large one.

24523.name: Marimo Lamp
24523.description: The product of a skilled yet not particularly creative metalworker who took inspiration from the lamp marimo to create...a lamp containing lamp marimo.

24524.name: Honey Pot
24524.description: Keeping this much honey in the house is just asking for bear-related trouble.

24525.name: Red Carpet
24525.description: A slim length of carpeting to welcome honored guests.

24526.name: Hanging Planter Shelf
24526.description: Various potted plants dangle from this wall-mounted shelf, leaving the space atop it free for other items. Or more plants.

24527.name: Plush Pile
24527.description: Stuffed moogles and tonberries and bears, oh my.

24535.name: Simple Treehouse
24535.description: No girls allowed. And while we're at it─no boys, either.

24536.name: Botanist's Garden
24536.description: A vegetable patch so lovingly tended that it could only have been cultivated by an expert.

24538.name: Teal Blue Carpeting
24538.description: Durable yet fuzzy loop carpet in a soothing blue-green.

24539.name: Black-and-white Interior Wall
24539.description: A wooden interior wall painted with a monochrome pattern of wide horizontal stripes.

24540.name: Moonlit Tank Trimmings
24540.description:
An assortment of items used to outfit an aquarium that it might resemble the moonlit eve upon which a nightbloom once flowered...

[For use in any tier aquarium.]

24541.name: Lily of the Valley Pips
24541.description:
Mature rootstalks that will grow and flower with sweet-smelling (though highly poisonous) bell-shaped blooms.

※For use in planters.

24542.name: Red Lilies of the Valley
24542.description:
A bunch of red lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24543.name: Blue Lilies of the Valley
24543.description:
A bunch of blue lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24544.name: Yellow Lilies of the Valley
24544.description:
A bunch of yellow lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24545.name: Green Lilies of the Valley
24545.description:
A bunch of green lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24546.name: Orange Lilies of the Valley
24546.description:
A bunch of orange lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24547.name: Purple Lilies of the Valley
24547.description:
A bunch of purple lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24548.name: White Lilies of the Valley
24548.description:
A bunch of white lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24549.name: Black Lilies of the Valley
24549.description:
A bunch of black lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24550.name: Rainbow Lilies of the Valley
24550.description:
A bunch of multicolored lilies of the valley, selectively fertilized to achieve a variety of vibrant colors.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

24577.name: Raw Ishgardian Materials
24577.description: Unsorted and unrefined materials that look like any other sort of materials, but which you are assured are genuinely Ishgardian.

24578.name: Raw Fermenting Supplies
24578.description: Unsorted and unprocessed fruit, yeast, and other materials necessary for fermenting alcohol.

24579.name: Raw Steppe Cookware Materials
24579.description: Unsorted and unrefined materials from the Azim Steppe that you are assured can be used to create the necessary components for cooking authentic buuz.

24580.name: Raw Tavern Furnishing Materials
24580.description: Unsorted and unrefined materials that look as if they could be used to create stylish furnishings─if you squint.

24581.name: Raw Brewing Vat Materials
24581.description: Unsorted and unrefined materials that you are assured can be used to assemble the necessary components for brewing arkhi.

24630.name: Eurekan Petrel Horn
24630.description: A delicate shell horn that summons the beautiful and dangerous gastropod known as the Eurekan petrel.

24634.name: Seitei
24634.description:
Dragon-ness is in the eye of the beholder.

Use item to acquire the Seitei minion.

24635.name: Conditional Virtue
24635.description:
Cuddle not to dullness; coddle not to elevation.

Use item to acquire the Conditional Virtue minion.

24639.name: Wind-up Weapon
24639.description:
Somewhat buggy.

Use item to acquire the wind-up weapon minion.

24640.name: Yukinko Snowflake
24640.description:
Falling, falling, falling, falling, falling...falling on his head.

Use item to acquire the yukinko snowflake minion.

24799.name: Seiryu Barding
24799.description: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble the Far Eastern auspice Seiryu.

24803.name: Seiryu's Scale
24803.description: A shimmering scale that once protected the body of the most venerable serpentine auspice.

24804.name: Waterproof Cloth
24804.description: This durable fabric is backed with a layer of rubber, making it far less permeable to water than typical garment materials.

24809.name: Obscure Logogram
24809.description: Crystallized memory that likely contains knowledge of arts so specialized or ill-advised as to have been kept hidden from all but a select few.

24815.name: Cryptic Seal
24815.description: A small statuette engraved with inscrutable ancient pictographs.

24816.name: Damascene Cloth
24816.description: This cloth was woven using a long and complicated process. It is a traditional fabric from the south of Othard.

24817.name: Molech's Horn
24817.description: A hulking horn that once adorned the head of the cruel Molech.

24818.name: Goldemar's Horn
24818.description: As part of his efforts to project a sense of economic might, King Goldemar had even his own horns opulently engraved─not that it will do him much good now that you have torn this one from his head.

24819.name: Ceto's Claw
24819.description: This was once the pointiest point on one of Ceto's lethally sharp appendages. Handle with care.

24859.name: Red Lily of the Valley Corsage

24860.name: Blue Lily of the Valley Corsage

24861.name: Yellow Lily of the Valley Corsage

24862.name: Green Lily of the Valley Corsage

24863.name: Orange Lily of the Valley Corsage

24864.name: Purple Lily of the Valley Corsage

24865.name: White Lily of the Valley Corsage

24866.name: Black Lily of the Valley Corsage

24867.name: Rainbow Lily of the Valley Corsage

24868.name: Carbuncle Chandelier
24868.description: Because who doesn't want to be welcomed home from a hard day's adventuring by a few Carbuncles dangling from their ceiling?

24881.name: Lily of the Veil
24881.description:
A queen among Ala Mhigan ribbons, and lady of the waters of the Arms of Meed.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24882.name: The Vegetarian
24882.description:
Fisher legend has there was once a mighty liopleurodon who, unsatisfied with a diet of Namazu, is said to have set its sights on plumper prey─namely a portly Lalafellin regent with a penchant for skinny dipping in the warm waters near Hells' Lid. However, the fish quickly learned the limits of its maw's gape, and crestfallen, abandoned the king, a crown-shaped scar on its upper lip its only prize. But rather than sulk, this beast from the deep spent the rest of its life devouring creatures far larger than it, and now, five thousand summers later, the descendant of that legendary pioneer polishes off Plainsfolk like they were popotoes, proving once and for all...life truly does find a way.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

24883.name: Seven Stars
24883.description:
A king among tawny wench sharks, and lord of the waters off the Isle of Bekko.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24884.name: Pinhead
24884.description:
A king among globefish, and lord of the waters off Isari.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24885.name: Pomegranate Trout
24885.description:
A queen among Doman trout, and lady of the waters of the Heron's Nest.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24886.name: Glarramundi
24886.description:
A king among river barramundi, and lord of the waters of the Heron's Way.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24887.name: Hermit's End
24887.description:
A king among nogoi, and lord of the waters of Namai.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24888.name: Suiten Ippeki
24888.description:
A king among lordly salmon, and lord of the waters near the mercantile docks.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24889.name: Axelrod
24889.description:
A king among Yanxian barramundi, and lord of the waters of the One River (east).

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24890.name: The Unraveled Bow
24890.description:
A king among Doman eels, and lord of the waters of Prism Canyon.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24891.name: Nhaama's Treasure
24891.description:
A queen among Nhaama's boons, and lady of the waters of Dotharl Khaa.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24892.name: Garden Skipper
24892.description:
A king among steppe skippers, and lord of the waters of Nem Khaal.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

24893.name: Banderole
24893.description:
A king among curtain plecos, and lord of the waters of Hak Khaal.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

24902.name: Abroader Otter
24902.description:
Hobbies include playing and having fun on an island in the sun.

Use item to acquire the abroader otter minion.

24903.name: Hedgehoglet
24903.description:
Only your selfless love and affection can keep him blissfully dilemma-free.

Use item to acquire the hedgehoglet minion.

24908.name: Salvaged Coinage
24908.description: Antique coins tarnished by centuries spent in the briny deep.

24990.name: Xenacanthus
24990.description:
This massive predator has haunted the nightmares of Gyr Abanians for generations as the legendary “impaler of Timmon Beck,” thanks to its centuries-old legacy of terrorizing smallfolk attempting to do their washing.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 4 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

24991.name: Drepanaspis
24991.description:
Perhaps the greatest catch to be found at Grymm & Enid, the drepanaspis is so rare that, until now, no one was sure that one could be found at Grymm & Enid.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

24992.name: Stethacanthus
24992.description:
The size of the growths on this stethacanthus indicate that it may be the oldest still in existence─and also why it has come to be known as the “Loch Seld monster.”

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

24993.name: The Ruby Dragon
24993.description:
This legendary king of the deep is known to all who have ever come near the Ruby Price─and yes, it is a dragon. Or at least it quite closely resembles one.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

24994.name: Warden of the Seven Hues
24994.description:
Though beautiful, this polychromatic carp ruled Prism Lake with an iron fin...until now.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 4 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

24995.name: The Unconditional
24995.description:
Not so much a lord as a god of Dotharl Khaa, this particular specimen is thought to be a blessing sent by the Dusk Mother and Dawn Father themselves. As such, this catch might be best left unboasted of.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

25001.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Overzealous Affirmations
25001.description: An illustrated manual of how not to express your enthusiasm for mashed popotoes in the middle of the dinner course. Use to learn the /fistpump emote.

25008.name: Kamacite Ore
25008.description: A chunk of long-fallen meteor containing the rare alloy kamacite.

25009.name: Kamacite
25009.description: A thin piece of smelted kamacite.

25058.name: From the Dragon's Wake Orchestrion Roll
25058.description: Music roll for From the Dragon's Wake. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25059.description: Music roll for A Pall Most Murderous. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25067.description: Music roll for Gates of Paradise - The Garden of Ru'Hmet. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25068.description: Music roll for Onslaught. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25069.description: Music roll for Turmoil. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25073.description: Music roll for Under the Stars. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25074.description: Music roll for Pressure (No. 1). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

25076.description: Music roll for A Man Consumed. Use to add to your orchestrion list.
