Exactly like any other type of sand, apart from the fact it is bright purple and may or may not electrocute those who get too close.

Can only be gathered during umbral levin.

Used in expert crafting recipes.

32049.name: Moonlight Guppy
32049.description:
A queen among platinum guppies, and lady of the waters of the rusted reservoir.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32050.name: Steel Fan
32050.description:
A king among noble's fans, and lord of the waters of White Oil Falls.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32051.name: Henodus Grandis
32051.description:
A king among henodus, and lord of the waters off the eastern Kholusian coast.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32052.name: Sunken Tome
32052.description:
A king among spotted ctenopoma, and lord of the waters of the Haughty One.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32053.name: Pearl Pipira
32053.description:
A queen among diamond pipira, and lady of the waters of the Red Chalice.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32054.name: The Ondotaker
32054.description:
A queen among Ondobane, and lady of the waters of Where the Dry Return.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

32055.name: Tortoiseshell Crab
32055.description:
Somewhere out there is bound to be a crabshell tortoise.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32056.name: Lady's Cameo
32056.description:
Initially named after a famous piece of jewelry, it has since become a favorite among goldsmiths crafting pieces of their own.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32057.name: Metallic Boxfish
32057.description:
Although this wavekin only inflates to a box shape when threatened, having a fisher's hook through its lip seems to be enough to trigger this response. As a result, they are rarely seen in a deflated state.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32058.name: Goobbue Ray
32058.description:
While this wavekin has much in common with the goobbues from which it gained its name, perhaps most noticeable is the expression of gormless contentment permanently etched on its face.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32059.name: Watermoura
32059.description:
While it moves with undeniable grace, the effect is rather spoiled by its brutish appearance.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32060.name: King Cobrafish
32060.description:
As a general rule, fish named after snakes are best left well alone.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32061.name: Mamahi-mahi
32061.description:
Its decidedly maternal-sounding name alludes to its remarkable fecundity.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32062.name: Lavandin Remora
32062.description:
Often confused with the similarly named lavender remora, but considering that they both taste more or less the same, this is little cause for concern.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32063.name: Spectral Butterfly
32063.description:
Some believe their appearance to be an omen of considerable riches on the horizon. Considering that these wavekin fetch a pretty gil at market, perhaps there is some truth to it.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32064.name: Cieldalaes Geode
32064.description:
The true beauty of this wavekin is on the inside, whereas on the outside, it looks like a coblyn in a bad mood.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32065.name: Titanshell Crab
32065.description:
Those wishing to sample the succulent meat inside must first contend with its near-impenetrable shell. Or alternatively, have the fishmonger do that part for them beforehand.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32066.name: Mythril Boxfish
32066.description:
Valued more for its boxlike remains than for its meat, which is astonishingly mediocre.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32067.name: Mistbeard's Cup
32067.description:
Judging by its volume, perhaps “Mistbeard's flagon” would have been a more apt name.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32068.name: Anomalocaris Saron
32068.description:
At a certain point in history, this wavekin simply stopped evolving. Its lackluster appearance would suggest that this is not due to having achieved unsurpassable perfection, but rather a lack of ambition on the part of the species as a whole.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32069.name: Flaming Eel
32069.description:
Sought more for its oil than for its meat, which is─as one might expect─rather oily.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32070.name: Jetborne Manta
32070.description:
Clever fishers will often latch onto one of these wavekin and use its extraordinary propulsion to pull their ships. Once it grows tired, they can repay its kindness by hauling it out of the water and eating it.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32071.name: Devil's Sting
32071.description:
It is best to catch this vicious wavekin before it catches you.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32072.name: Callichthyid
32072.description:
Being extremely heavy and covered in armored plates, attempting to catch and eat this wavekin is often more trouble than it is worth. Many fishers will cut their lines upon realizing they have snagged one.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

32073.name: Meandering Mora
32073.description:
Content to simply drift through life with barely a care in the world, this fish is so lazy that it feeds by opening its mouth on the off chance that something edible might find its way inside.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32075.name: Thaliak Crab
32075.description:
Something of an anomaly among crabs as it spends its life moving back and forth between salt- and freshwater. Its flavor differs according to where it is caught.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32076.name: Star of the Destroyer
32076.description:
Believed by some to be living fragments of Rhalgr's beacon, their gentle glow from beneath the waves is a welcome sight to many a sailor.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32077.name: True Scad
32077.description:
Let none doubt the trueness of this scad.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32078.name: Blooded Wrasse
32078.description:
Fishers should not feel guilty for the bloodstains on the fish's head, as these are largely self-inflicted. They can instead feel guilty about the hook through the mouth, as well as the gutting and cleaning that comes shortly after.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32079.name: Bloodpolish Crab
32079.description:
These wavekin cover their claws in blood to make themselves presentable to potential mates. Though this may seem odd, perhaps it is best not to attempt to understand the inner workings of a crab's mind.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32080.name: Blue Stitcher
32080.description:
Considering its thin legs are often likened to needles, one cannot expect to get much meat from them. The torso, on the other hand, is a firm favorite among seafarers.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32081.name: Bloodfresh Tuna
32081.description:
Its blood red meat is the centerpiece of many expensive dishes, though some claim it is chosen more for its appearance than its taste.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32082.name: Sunken Mask
32082.description:
Though inanimate objects are seldom a welcome sight on a fisher's line, the goblin owner of this mask would no doubt be prepared to pay a small fortune to have it returned.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32083.name: Spectral Eel
32083.description:
Do not be fooled by its heavenly aura, for there is naught mystical about this wavekin. In fact, it should be battered over the head before it has the chance to bite someone.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32084.name: Bareface
32084.description:
Said to resemble an unmasked goblin, not that most people would know what that looks like...

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32085.name: Oracular Crab
32085.description:
While bloodpolish crabs are certainly frightening, this larger and more violent relative is nothing less than a nightmare come to life.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32086.name: Dravanian Bream
32086.description:
With all the hellish waterborne fiends and bizarre creatures that seem like the product of a fever dream, sometimes it makes a welcome change to meet a nice, normal fish.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32087.name: Skaldminni
32087.description:
Though it is said that this wavekin is the instrument of a fabled bard given life, the awkward flopping sound it makes when landed is anything but musical.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32088.name: Serrated Clam
32088.description:
While this clam may look far more imposing than most, one must remind oneself that it is still only a clam, and only capable of causing a very limited amount of harm. Still, it is best to watch one's fingers, all the same.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32089.name: Beatific Vision
32089.description:
After too long at sea, even this horrendously ugly fish can seem almost like a visitation from a divine being. Almost.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32090.name: Exterminator
32090.description:
Experienced fishers will make sure this insatiable wavekin is well and truly dead before putting it anywhere near their other catches, otherwise it will devour them in a matter of moments.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32091.name: Gory Tuna
32091.description:
To survive amongst such vicious company, this fish needs to be tough, which some would say is reflected in the texture of its meat.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32092.name: Ticinepomis
32092.description:
This fish moves so slowly that most other wavekin barely even realize it is alive, and pay it little heed.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32093.name: Quartz Hammerhead
32093.description:
This shark possesses extraordinarily strong neck muscles, which it needs to stop itself being dragged down to the seabed by its weighty head.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

32095.name: Crow Puffer
32095.description:
Though it may be both feared and revered by its ocean-dwelling neighbors, even the most potent of natural defenses means little when dangling from a fisher's line.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32096.name: Rothlyt Kelp
32096.description:
There are far easier ways to gather kelp than by reeling it in clump by clump, but most fishers will gladly accept such a “catch” rather than throw it back into the sea.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32097.name: Living Lantern
32097.description:
A living lantern has a number of uses, assuming one can keep it alive. After all, it only retains its lantern-like qualities while it is living, hence the name.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32098.name: Honeycomb Fish
32098.description:
It is remarkable how much this fish resembles a bee's nest, given that it has probably never even seen one before.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32099.name: Godsbed
32099.description:
One should refrain from attempting to use this bivalve as a bed, since this tends to reduce its value in the eyes of potential buyers. If they find out about it, that is.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32100.name: Lansquenet
32100.description:
Something of a mercenary among fish, it offers protection to smaller fish, though it seems to receive little in return. Perhaps it eats a few of them when the others are not looking?

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32101.name: Thavnairian Shark
32101.description:
Although there are countless species of shark, the main concern among fishers is “How likely is it to eat me?”

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32102.name: Nephrite Eel
32102.description:
Some experts believe that the young nephrite eel's coloration helps it to hide among seaweed, which protects it from larger predators and offers a place from which to ambush prey of its own.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32103.name: Spectresaur
32103.description:
Eyewitnesses claim it to be the spirit of a long-dead seabeast. In truth, it is very much alive, which is probably a lot worse than if it were a ghost.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32104.name: Ginkgo Fin
32104.description:
This minute wavekin cunningly disguises itself as a ginkgo leaf. This would be even more cunning, however, if ginkgo trees actually existed anywhere near the open sea.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32105.name: Garum Jug
32105.description:
Those able to fight their way past the ink-like liquid emitted by this fish in defense will be rewarded with a tasty snack and a useful container.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32106.name: Smooth Jaguar
32106.description:
While there are many wavekin named after lions and tigers, the majestic jaguar is criminally underrepresented.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32107.name: Rothlyt Mussel
32107.description:
Many fishmongers pride themselves on using every part of the creatures in which they deal. In the case of the mussel, however, there are only two parts to worry about: the shell and the...squishy thing inside.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32108.name: Levi Elver
32108.description:
Of all the species of eel, levi elvers are said to most closely resemble Leviathan, although their much-reduced size does make them rather less imposing.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32109.name: Pearl Bombfish
32109.description:
Although bombfish do not actually explode in the same way as their namesakes, they look as if they could were they so inclined, which is enough to deter many would-be predators.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32110.name: Trollfish
32110.description:
Catching one of these brutes would be doing a great service to the other wavekin who share their waters.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32111.name: Panoptes
32111.description:
The myriad dots that resemble eyes are said to confuse certain predators. This only works, however, if said predator actually cares whether it has been seen.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

32112.name: Crepe Sole
32112.description:
The story goes that it was named after an item of footwear. Whether or not this is true, the fact remains that it looks like it has been stepped on.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

32113.name: Knifejaw
32113.description:
Must be handled with extreme care after being reeled in. Many fishers keep a long blade nearby to give it a good stabbing before even attempting to handle it.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

32162.name: Forgotten Fragment of Observation
32162.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 10
Potential memory contained: Lost Perception

32163.name: Forgotten Fragment of Deception
32163.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 13
Potential memory contained: Pure Essence of the Gambler

32164.name: Forgotten Fragment of Loss
32164.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 14
Potential memory contained: Lost Sacrifice

32165.name: Forgotten Fragment of Clarity
32165.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 15
Potential memories contained: Pure Essence of the Elder, Lost Flare Star

32201.name: Garlean Synthetic Fabric
32201.description: Material shorn from an imperial uniform proven to be exceedingly nonconductive to aether.

32202.name: Grilled Eel Set
32202.description: An Eastern delicacy that fills stomachs as quickly as it empties coinpurses. Connoisseurs advise eating only the smallest amount at a time, so as to make it last as long as possible. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Direct Hit Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

32203.name: Goobbue Lamp
32203.description: The elegance of the softly glowing fruit and beautiful verdant leaves is strangely juxtaposed by the gormless expression of the goobbue base.

32205.name: Tankard
32205.description: Contains enough ale to drown at least a couple of sorrows.

32206.name: Emerald Weapon Bust
32206.description:
Includes six floating manipulators, all of which appear to be offering to take one's coat.

※One per estate only.

32210.name: Queen's Gunner Piece
32210.description: Can be strategically placed to deter burglars, providing that they are already inside the building at the time.

32211.name: Queen's Soldier Piece
32211.description: Though it appears to be some sort of mammet, it is entirely incapable of independent movement. Considering that it comes equipped with a potentially deadly blade, perhaps that is for the best.

32212.name: Shakshouka Pot
32212.description: Of the many and varied ingredients that comprise this dish, it is the humble hen's egg that takes center stage. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Critical Hit Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

32213.name: Stuffed Cait Sith
32213.description: Those expecting this stuffed creature to start shouting through a voice amplification device and riding a remarkably burly moogle may be disappointed.

32214.name: Antique Sink
32214.description: If by “antique” one means “very old and likely to break at any moment,” this sink has been accurately described.

32215.name: Spring Meadow Partition
32215.description: If one wishes to experience the joys of spring, this partition should be just the ticket. Alternatively, one could try stepping outside, assuming that it is currently the correct season.

32216.name: Ishgardian Stove
32216.description: Perhaps not quite as stable as one would like, considering that it is likely to contain burning coals and have a pot of boiling liquid balanced precariously on top.

32217.name: Extra-stuffed Carbuncle
32217.description: How much more stuffed could this be? The answer is none. None more stuffed.

32218.name: Carbuncle House Slippers
32218.description:
“Don't get me wrong, I like Carbuncles. I just don't want them on my feet, that's all.”
─A bemused arcanist

32219.name: Iron Torch
32219.description: Give your home that authentic “scary castle” feel, but make sure the room is well ventilated to avoid smoke inhalation.

32220.name: Major-General Cushion
32220.description: It's a shark. With legs. And is also a cushion.

32221.name: Rose Trellis
32221.description: Keeps even the wildest of roses neatly organized.

32222.name: Dragon Icon
32222.description: One may struggle to fit a statue of a large golden dragon wrapped around an expensive-looking indigo orb into their existing décor without spending large amounts of gil on suitably opulent furnishings to match.

32223.name: Royal Lion
32223.description: It may be best to consider this as half of a matching pair, as a single lion statue tends to look a bit lonely by itself.

32224.name: Swag Valance
32224.description:
“This room has too much...wall. We should cover some of it in cloth.”
─Unknown furnishing connoisseur

32225.name: Rustic Chocobo Counter
32225.description: Bring the delights of a genuine chocobo stable to the inside of your home, complete with that unmistakable aroma.

32226.name: Wood Slat Partition
32226.description: Useful for when one wishes to block something from view while still being able to see it.

32227.name: Homemade Cookie Set
32227.description: This decorative ornament is ideal for giving guests the impression that one is an accomplished culinarian. Little will they know that the “dough” is in fact entirely inedible.

32228.name: Florist's Counter
32228.description: For some reason, the name “flowermonger” never quite caught on.

32229.name: Paissa Swing Chair
32229.description: For those who wish to be gently rocked by a hanging piece of furniture resembling the most terrifying creature in the known world.

32230.name: Showcase
32230.description: The lack of shelves makes this case ideally suited to displaying larger objects, unless one prefers to crouch while observing smaller ornaments.

32231.name: Shelving Showcase
32231.description: Ready to be filled with countless trophies, provided one is gifted enough to earn them in the first place.

32232.name: Elemental Wheel
32232.description: Depicts the intrinsic relationships between the six elements, which govern all life on this star, and probably a few other stars to boot.

32233.name: Toy Showcase
32233.description: It appears that stuffed animals have infested this showcase, which is normally reserved for more austere pieces of ornamentation.

32234.name: Apparel Showcase
32234.description: Some people like others to see their items of finery even when they are not being worn.

32235.name: Armament Showcase
32235.description: While such arms are largely displayed for heraldic purposes, they would still come in handy in a pinch.

32236.name: Art Showcase
32236.description: Provides fine pieces of art some degree of protection from the sticky hands of overly curious children.

32237.name: Baked Goods Showcase
32237.description: Though some people may be baffled by the idea of using pastries as ornaments, this display case is not for those people.

32239.name: Queen's Warrior Piece
32239.description: Guarding a queen is certainly not an easy job, but it does come with the unexpected perk of possibly being immortalized in the form of a household ornament.

32240.name: Queen's Knight Piece
32240.description: Though knights are known for standing their ground, their ability to remain steadfast is somewhat hindered by the three little wheels at the base, which all seem to want to roll off in a different direction.

32242.name: Toymaker's Show Window
32242.description: A perfect demonstration of one's toy-making abilities, or perhaps “toy-buying” abilities.

32243.name: Designer's Show Window
32243.description: Placing anything in a glass display case has the effect of making it appear expensive and luxurious, which many designers rely on to justify their ludicrously high prices.

32244.name: Smith's Show Window
32244.description: In case of emergency, smash glass and commence hacking and slashing.

32245.name: Artist's Show Window
32245.description: Though it is customary to charge for admission to art exhibitions, passersby can experience these works of fine art for free.

32246.name: Baker's Show Window
32246.description: When the sunlight hits the glass at the right angle, it has the effect of keeping the bread inside warm.

32248.name: Parkside Tree
32248.description: The parkside quality of this tree does depend rather heavily on its vicinity to a park.

32249.name: Brick Paving
32249.description: All these squares make a square.

32250.name: La Noscean Grape Pergola
32250.description: This wooden frame gives grape vines the means to climb to greater heights, in a quite literal sense.

32251.name: Fruitful Fountain
32251.description: Where most fountains would produce an upward-pointing spray of water, this one includes what experts call an “arboreal protrusion.”

32252.name: Herringbone Flooring
32252.description: Most herring would argue that their bones bear little resemblance to this flooring design.

32253.name: Skylight Chandelier
32253.description: This exquisite piece utilizes natural sunlight to provide illumination. How it continues to work at night, however, is a closely guarded secret.

32254.name: Varied Wood Interior Wall
32254.description: While the wooden pieces may appear to be randomly placed, there is method in the madness. Or possibly madness in the method.

32255.name: Small Florist's Walls
32255.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to bedeck their home with an abundance of flowers. Allergy sufferers beware.

※Can only be used with cottages on small plots of land.

32256.name: Medium Florist's Walls
32256.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to bedeck their home with an abundance of flowers─and be forever dusting the pollen from their deck chairs.

※Can only be used with houses on medium plots of land.

32257.name: Large Florist's Walls
32257.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to bedeck their home with an abundance of flowers. Note that certain flora are known to attract murderbees.

※Can only be used with mansions on large plots of land.

32812.name: Carnation Seeds
32812.description:
Given the right conditions, these seeds will produce near endless amounts of beautiful carnations. Assuming that is, that the bag has been correctly labeled. If not, they may very well produce man-eating morbols...or worse.

※For use in planters.

32813.name: Red Carnations
32813.description:
A bunch of red carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32814.name: Blue Carnations
32814.description:
A bunch of blue carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32815.name: Yellow Carnations
32815.description:
A bunch of yellow carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32816.name: Green Carnations
32816.description:
A bunch of green carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32817.name: Orange Carnations
32817.description:
A bunch of orange carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32818.name: Purple Carnations
32818.description:
A bunch of purple carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32819.name: White Carnations
32819.description:
A bunch of white carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32820.name: Black Carnations
32820.description:
A bunch of black carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32821.name: Rainbow Carnations
32821.description:
A bunch of multicolored carnations, selectively fertilized to achieve a variety of vibrant colors.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

32822.name: Emerald Plating
32822.description: A hunk of verdant metal torn from the Emerald Weapon.

32823.name: Emerald Barding
32823.description: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble the Emerald Weapon.

32824.name: Queen's Guard Barding
32824.description: A suit of chocobo armor modeled after that worn by a legendary queen's personal guard─willingly and otherwise.

32826.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Concealing Meals
32826.description: An illustrated manual detailing how to best conceal Eastern foodstuffs about one's person in the likely event the hors d'oeuvres on offer are insufficient to sate one's hunger. Use to learn the /riceball emote.

32827.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Apples with Aplomb
32827.description: An illustrated manual of how to enjoy a delicious apple while projecting an air of unassailable dignity in spite of your squirrel-like gnawing. Use to learn the /eatapple emote.

32828.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Good Will Seeking
32828.description: An illustrated manual of how to bring oneself into the good graces of others. Use to learn the /wringhands emote.

32829.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Next, Godliness
32829.description: An illustrated manual detailing how to operate the quaint device known as a “broom” in event of dire circumstances involving the absence of one's servants. Use to learn the /broom emote.

32830.name: Ballroom Etiquette - Decadent Decoration
32830.description: An illustrated manual explaining the ideal method for painting over pesky or potentially haunted patterns in one's wallpaper. Use to learn the /paintblack, /paintred, /paintblue, and /paintyellow emotes.

32831.name: Forgotten Fragment of Contention
32831.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 15
Potential memories contained: Pure Essence of the Duelist, Lost Rend Armor

32832.name: Forgotten Fragment of Finesse
32832.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 15
Potential memories contained: Pure Essence of the Fiendhunter, Lost Dervish

32833.name: Forgotten Fragment of Fortitude
32833.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 15
Potential memories contained: Pure Essence of the Indomitable, Lost Aethershield

32834.name: Forgotten Fragment of Divinity
32834.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 15
Potential memories contained: Pure Essence of the Divine, Lost Seraph Strike

32835.name: Modern Aesthetics - Early to Rise
32835.description:
The realm's premier publication on beauty and fashion, this specific copy of Modern Aesthetics covers, in detail, techniques for weaving a simple-yet-elegant braid that can be employed by even those who are not yet fully awake.

Use to unlock a new hairstyle at the aesthetician.
Unavailable to Viera and Hrothgar.

32841.name: Big Shell Whistle
32841.description: This whistle emits a shrill tone that is said to summon a big shell, and presumably some sort of creature inside said shell.

32846.name: Gabriel Mark III Identification Key
32846.description: A thin, rectangular piece of what appears to be cermet. Placing it near your Gabriel Mark III will bring it to life.

32848.name: Syldrion-class Insubmersible
32848.description:
Unlike the craft on which it is modeled, it will break immediately upon coming into contact with water.

Use item to acquire the Syldrion-class insubmersible minion.

32855.name: Save the Princess
32855.description:
For every person who has ever dreamed of owning a wheeled, spindly legged, trumpet-blowing mammet, there is this wheeled, spindly legged, trumpet-blowing mammet.

Use item to acquire the Save the Princess minion.

32856.name: Drippy
32856.description:
With a will to wander the world, one wonders whether said world will welcome this well-meaning watery whelp.

Use item to acquire the Drippy minion.

32857.name: Trike
32857.description:
Very affectionate, but be prepared to make a quick sidestep if it comes running to greet you.

Use item to acquire the Trike minion.

32858.name: Golden Beaver
32858.description:
Remember: all that glitters is not gold. Sometimes, it is a beaver.

Use item to acquire the golden beaver minion.

32859.name: Magicked Prism (Bomb Head)
32859.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Gives the impression that one's head is large, orange, and bulbous, which may be an improvement in some cases.

32860.name: Magicked Prism (Numeral 0)
32860.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Causes a large “O” to appear in midair. Or is that an “O”?

32861.name: Magicked Prism (Numeral 1)
32861.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Causes a large “1” to appear in midair.

32862.name: Magicked Prism (Numeral 2)
32862.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Causes a large “2” to appear in midair.

32863.name: Magicked Prism (Numeral 3)
32863.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Causes a large “3” to appear in midair.

32864.name: Magicked Prism (Numeral 4)
32864.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Causes a large “4” to appear in midair.

32865.name: Magicked Prism (Numeral 5)
32865.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Causes a large “5” to appear in midair.

32936.name: Solstice Ingot
32936.description: A large block of solid crystal, ready to be chiseled into whatever form the craftsman desires.

32937.name: Saffron Cloth
32937.description: Finely woven cloth dyed a vibrant orange with gardenia fruit, rather than the expensive spice after which the color was named.

32938.name: Thylacoleo Leather
32938.description: A large piece of cured thylacoleo skin.

32939.name: Grade 4 Strength Alkahest
32939.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to strength, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

32940.name: Grade 4 Dexterity Alkahest
32940.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to dexterity, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

32941.name: Grade 4 Vitality Alkahest
32941.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to vitality, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

32942.name: Grade 4 Intelligence Alkahest
32942.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to intelligence, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

32943.name: Grade 4 Mind Alkahest
32943.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to mind, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

32944.name: Horsetail
32944.description: A robust grass resembling a horse's tail, often used as an abrasive.

32945.name: Aluminum Ore
32945.description: A sizable piece of rock containing traces of the metal aluminum.

32946.name: Workbench Refining Sand
32946.description: This all-in-one abrasive, created for craftsmen of all disciplines─and even some with no discipline whatsoever─can be used to both sand metals and polish them to a lustrous sheen.

32947.name: Gardenia Fruit
32947.description: Originating in the Far East, the fruit may be dried and used to dye cloth.

32948.name: Thylacoleo Skin
32948.description: The hide of the thylacoleo─a primitive beastkin predator.

32949.name: Spirit Extract
32949.description: The condensed aether of a once-living being. The essence of its essence, so to speak.

32950.name: Silver Beech Log
32950.description: A rough-cut log of silver beech timber.

32951.name: Dolomite
32951.description: A semi-translucent rock containing the rare mineral dolomite.

32952.name: Solstice Stone
32952.description: A mysterious crystal of purest white.

32953.name: Raindrop Cotton Boll
32953.description: The cotton produced by this particular species is said to be as delicate to the touch as a raindrop. Unfortunately, this makes it rather difficult to pick without crushing the boll.

32954.name: Wattle Petribark
32954.description: Though this bark has a number of uses, being in an apparently semi-fossilized state does make it somewhat troublesome to work with.

32955.name: Hard Water
32955.description: To the layman, hard water may sound like a convoluted way to say “ice,” but experts would disagree. In any case, it is at least soft enough to be poured into and out of a bottle.

33027.name: Calf Leather
33027.description: A large piece of cured calf hide.

33037.name: Pleasant Dot Parasol
33037.description: Should the weather prove so inclement, the skies so heavy with rain, that one is forced to rely upon a parasol, can it truly be called pleasant? (Yes. Just look at the name.) Use to acquire a pleasant dot parasol.

33038.name: Prim Dot Parasol
33038.description: Whether or not this parasol could be considered prim rather depends on the person holding it at the time. Use to acquire a prim dot parasol.

33039.name: Pastoral Dot Parasol
33039.description: It could be argued that any parasol could be made to appear pastoral if set against a suitably bucolic background. Use to acquire a pastoral dot parasol.

33110.name: The Black Wolf Stalks Again Orchestrion Roll
33110.description: Music roll for The Black Wolf Stalks Again. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33112.name: The Sochen Cave Palace (Zodiac Age Version) Orchestrion Roll
33112.description: Music roll for The Sochen Cave Palace (Zodiac Age Version). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33113.name: Giving Chase (Zodiac Age Version) Orchestrion Roll
33113.description: Music roll for Giving Chase (Zodiac Age Version). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33114.name: The Queen Awakens Orchestrion Roll
33114.description: Music roll for The Queen Awakens. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33115.name: Freshly Glazed Porxie Orchestrion Roll
33115.description: Music roll for Freshly Glazed Porxie. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33116.name: Don't Be Afraid Orchestrion Roll
33116.description: Music roll for Don't Be Afraid. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33117.name: The Legendary Beast Orchestrion Roll
33117.description: Music roll for The Legendary Beast. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33118.name: Promises to Keep Orchestrion Roll
33118.description: Music roll for Promises to Keep. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33119.name: The Extreme Orchestrion Roll
33119.description: Music roll for The Extreme. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33120.name: Nemesis Orchestrion Roll
33120.description: Music roll for Nemesis. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33121.name: Everywhere and Nowhere Orchestrion Roll
33121.description: Music roll for Everywhere and Nowhere. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33122.name: Tomorrow and Tomorrow - Reprise Orchestrion Roll
33122.description: Music roll for Tomorrow and Tomorrow - Reprise. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33123.name: Dangerous Words Orchestrion Roll
33123.description: Music roll for Dangerous Words. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33124.name: Unmatching Pieces Orchestrion Roll
33124.description: Music roll for Unmatching Pieces. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33125.name: The Ludus Orchestrion Roll
33125.description: Music roll for The Ludus. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33126.name: Faith in Her Fury Orchestrion Roll
33126.description: Music roll for Faith in Her Fury. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33127.name: Hearthward Orchestrion Roll
33127.description: Music roll for Hearthward. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33128.name: Painted Skies Orchestrion Roll
33128.description: Music roll for Painted Skies. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33130.name: Below Orchestrion Roll
33130.description: Music roll for Below. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33131.name: Dancing Calcabrina Orchestrion Roll
33131.description: Music roll for Dancing Calcabrina. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33135.name: Faded Copy of The Black Wolf Stalks Again
33135.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing the full score for The Black Wolf Stalks Again.

33143.name: Cashmere Attire Coffer
33143.description:
A banded chest containing a complete set of cashmere attire.

Cannot be opened in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

33144.name: Casual Attire Coffer
33144.description:
A banded chest containing a complete set of casual attire.

Cannot be opened in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

33145.name: Construct VI-S Core
33145.description: The golem summoned by this core is painted red so it goes faster. Painting the core itself red, however, does not appear to offer any discernible benefit.

33147.name: Humic Soil
33147.description: A carefully prepared blend of soil and decaying leaves.

33148.name: Pot Marjoram
33148.description: An aromatic herb used in various dishes and remedies.

33149.name: Water Mint
33149.description: A versatile herb that grows easily in moist soil.

33150.name: Wild Sage
33150.description: A fragrant herb popular with culinarians...and their customers.

33151.name: Countess Tea Leaves
33151.description: Once consumed exclusively by the upper classes but now available to the hoi polloi.

33152.name: Dacite
33152.description: A solid piece of cooled lava, its burning fury in a dormant state.

33186.name: Resplendent Carpenter's Material A
33186.description: A sealed package containing carpenter's materials, most likely wood or something vaguely tree-related, at the very least.

33187.name: Resplendent Blacksmith's Material A
33187.description: A crate that makes a dull clanking sound when shaken.

33188.name: Resplendent Armorer's Material A
33188.description: This box of armorer's supplies is about as heavy as one might expect. The question is: which will give out first, the bottom of the crate or the carrier's back?

33189.name: Resplendent Goldsmith's Material A
33189.description: The clinking sound coming from within is suspiciously similar to that of broken glass. This does not bode well.

33190.name: Resplendent Leatherworker's Material A
33190.description: A bundle of leather wrapped in leather, bound with a leather strap.

33191.name: Resplendent Weaver's Material A
33191.description: Take care when delving into this sack as there are probably needles inside.

33192.name: Resplendent Alchemist's Material A
33192.description: The life of an alchemist tends to be something of a mixed bag, much like the manner in which their supplies are delivered.

33193.name: Resplendent Culinarian's Material A
33193.description: The strange way in which the package is twitching indicates the freshness of the ingredients inside, if one takes “fresh” to mean “still alive.”

33239.name: Listracanthus
33239.description:
Those fortunate enough to have seen this primitive species of shark patrolling the waters near the Isle of Ken are invariably puzzled by its flowing mane, which seems to serve no practical purpose whatsoever.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

33240.name: Aquamaton
33240.description:
Those hoping to catch their dinner in Seagazer Shoals are in for a shock if they reel in one of these strange, dwarven contraptions. Apparently, they fetch a high price at market, assuming one can find a buyer.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

33241.name: Cinder Surprise
33241.description:
These bizarre, steaming-hot creatures inhabit the River of Sand, and on rare occasions, find themselves on anglers' hooks. Said anglers are normally bemused by such an apparently inedible catch, but when desperately searching for sustenance in the arid desert, one takes what one can find.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33242.name: Ealad Skaan
33242.description:
Very rarely caught in Longmirror Lake, the fisher is invariably struck by pangs of guilt at having sunk their hook into such a charming, delicate creature.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33243.name: Greater Serpent of Ronka
33243.description:
Fishers who succeed in reeling this enigmatic beast in from the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta will almost certainly come to regret it. Whether that is due to its supposed likeness to a particular mythological, godlike creature, or simply because of its unnerving appearance depends entirely on the fisher.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

33244.name: Lancetfish
33244.description:
Those fishing the waters of the northwest Caliban Gorge are advised that, if they attempt to handle this bellicose wavekin, they should avoid the pointy bits. Many will attest, however, that as practically the entire fish fits that description, it is best to simply give it as wide a berth as possible.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 4 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

33245.name: Small Forge's Walls
33245.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a forge.

※Can only be used with cottages on small plots of land.

33246.name: Medium Forge's Walls
33246.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a forge.

※Can only be used with houses on medium plots of land.

33247.name: Large Forge's Walls
33247.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a forge.

※Can only be used with mansions on large plots of land.

33248.name: Storm Blue Interior Wall
33248.description: A blue interior wall for those estate owners who wish to make a simple statement.

33249.name: Cream Yellow Carpet
33249.description: Durable-yet-fuzzy loop carpet in a cozy cream yellow.

33250.name: Cloud Acorn Chandelier
33250.description: “Quaint” does not begin to describe this chandelier made with cloud acorns still hanging on the branch.

33253.name: Diamond Weapon Bust
33253.description:
Arguably more shoulders than bust, but undeniably menacing in either case.

※One per estate only.

33257.name: Stuffed Peerifool
33257.description: This stuffed Peerifool is so true to life, you can almost smell the cloying stench.

33258.name: Eastern Indoor Pond
33258.description: Constructed in the Eastern fashion, this pond is hemmed in natural stone and comes with carp swimming gracefully.

33259.name: Grocery Counter Cart
33259.description: A mobile kitchen counter designed in the likeness of a wagon, laden with a selection of breads and fresh produce.

33260.name: Azim Steppe Phasmascape
33260.description: This advanced magitek contraption displays the wide, sweeping landscape of the Azim Steppe in vivid detail.

33261.name: Blue Moon Phasmascape
33261.description: This advanced magitek contraption displays a full moon hanging majestically in the night sky.

33262.name: Stuffed Android Units
33262.description: As they stood together as comrades, it is only fitting that 2B and 9S stand together as stuffed toys.

33263.name: Wooden Reel Table
33263.description: Formerly used to carry ropes and cables, this wooden reel has been repurposed as a table.

33264.name: Violin Showcase
33264.description: A wooden cabinet custom made for displaying violins. Comes complete with instruments.

33266.name: Pub Signboard
33266.description: When it comes to indicating the presence of a pub, nary a word is needed.

33267.name: Windowed Partition
33267.description: Extending to the ceiling, this partition incorporates a wide rectangular window.

33268.name: Hingan Windowed Partition
33268.description: Extending to the ceiling, this partition incorporates a round Hingan-style window.

33269.name: Mushroom Lamp
33269.description: Grown from a ball of moss, this luminescent mushroom gives off a gentle light.

33270.name: Sealed Letter
33270.description: While the contents are a mystery, whoever reads this letter is certain to regret it for the rest of their days.

33271.name: Wooden Spiral Staircase
33271.description: Spiral staircases are ideal for situations where there is insufficient space for conventional stairs.

33272.name: Approved Ishgardian Lunch
33272.description: Tasty and wholesome, this lunch set is said to be a favorite among skybuilders. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Control Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

33273.name: Country Dining Set
33273.description: Enjoy the bucolic life with this wooden dining set for four, finished with a checkered tablecloth.

33274.name: Akadaemia Prospectuses
33274.description: This collection of brochures provides detailed information to prospective students of the Akadaemia Anyder.

33275.name: Icebox
33275.description: Rather than with magic or magitek, this wooden box keeps its contents chilled the old-fashioned way─with a large block of ice.

33276.name: Red Brick Counter
33276.description: For years, academics have sought to explain why such counters of brick and timber enhance the flavor of liquor. Thus far, they have little to show for their research except ferocious hangovers.

33277.name: Necrologos Transcription
33277.description: While appearing to be gibberish, the words written within this tome fiendishly incorporate a summoning spell. Readers are advised to exercise caution lest they inadvertently unleash an army of voidsent.

33278.name: Hand-poured Coffee
33278.description: Aromatic coffee brewed by the time-honored pour-over method. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Perception Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

33279.name: Back Bar
33279.description: A tall wooden shelf commonly used in taverns to store and display liquor.

33280.name: Pixie Apple Basket
33280.description: A basket of pixie apples and a bottle of grape juice, perfect as a palate cleanser or simply a snack. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Piety Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

33281.name: Philosopher's Stone Table
33281.description: A round table of polished stone with a tree growing at its center, all of which is said to be conducive to enlightened debate.

33282.name: Crystarium Wardrobe
33282.description: A simple-yet-elegant wardrobe designed in the Crystarium style, complete with an array of outfits.

33283.name: Low Bookshelf
33283.description: A low, wide bookshelf featuring both open and closed compartments.

33284.name: Qiqirn Shelf
33284.description: Designed in a Qiqirn motif, this wooden shelf is as charming as it is practical.

33285.name: Mogbureau
33285.description: A writing table with storage designed in a moogle motif. Do not attempt to remove the pom-pom.

33286.name: Bar Rack
33286.description: A wooden rack for holding a selection of drinks and glasses. Hanging the glasses upside down prevents dust from gathering inside while avoiding chips to the rims.

33287.name: Portrait of Gestahl
33287.description: A beautiful rendering of a sweet little dog who somehow exudes the air of a tyrannical emperor. But look at how adorable he is!

33291.name: Goobbue Wall Chronometer
33291.description: A wall chronometer designed in a goobbue motif, a dazed look upon the creature's face.

33292.name: Armor Hanger
33292.description: Originally designed for ceremonial purposes for those of the Elezen persuasion, the attachments on the side of the helm allow it to be worn without bending the ears out of shape.

33293.name: Mounted Dinosaur Skull
33293.description: In a case of the hunter becoming the hunted, the cranium of this ferocious predator is now doomed to spend eternity in ignominy mounted as a trophy on an adventurer's wall. Its headless body must be rolling in its grave.

33294.name: Plot of Hydrangeas
33294.description: Lush hydrangea bushes with flowers blooming in all their vibrant glory.

33295.name: Glade Gazebo
33295.description: A gazebo designed in the glade fashion.

33296.name: Garden Tool Shelf
33296.description: A wooden shelf used for storing gardening implements.

33297.name: Eastern Wisteria
33297.description: A tree native to the Far East that produces hanging clusters of light-purple flowers, pruned to fit in a garden.

33299.name: Forging Bench
33299.description: An outdoor furnishing perfect for those who prefer to do their smithing out in the open. After all, attempting to do so in an enclosed space does come with the rather bothersome side effects brought on by smoke inhalation.

33300.name: Garden Anvil
33300.description: Best placed outdoors, as it tends to leave rather an undesirable impression on all but the most durable of floors.

33301.name: Materiel Table
33301.description: An outdoor furnishing including an assortment of arms and armor. Ideal for those situations where one finds oneself uttering, “Choose your weapon,” to an unruly house guest.

33302.name: Fête Party Balloons
33302.description: Seen adorning the Firmament during the Skyrise Celebration, this colorful bunch of balloons is guaranteed to fill the air with festive cheer.

33303.name: Fête Skyrise Balloon
33303.description: Seen adorning the Firmament during the Skyrise Celebration, this oversized balloon set upon an elegant mount brings a touch of sophistication to any festive occasion.

33306.name: Moth Orchid Seeds
33306.description:
Disagreement over whether these seeds thrive best in sunlight or lamplight has ended many a friendship between botanist and naturalist.

※For use in planters.

33307.name: Red Moth Orchids
33307.description:
A bunch of red moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33308.name: Blue Moth Orchids
33308.description:
A bunch of blue moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33309.name: Yellow Moth Orchids
33309.description:
A bunch of yellow moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33310.name: Green Moth Orchids
33310.description:
A bunch of green moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33311.name: Orange Moth Orchids
33311.description:
A bunch of orange moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33312.name: Purple Moth Orchids
33312.description:
A bunch of purple moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33313.name: White Moth Orchids
33313.description:
A bunch of white moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33314.name: Black Moth Orchids
33314.description:
A bunch of black moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33315.name: Rainbow Moth Orchids
33315.description:
A bunch of multicolored moth orchids, selectively fertilized to achieve a variety of vibrant colors.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

33316.name: Aster Trivi
33316.description:
A king among asteroidea, and lord of the waters of the Trivium.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33317.name: Python Discus
33317.description:
A king among snakeskin discus, and lord of the waters of Sullen.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33318.name: Steel Razor
33318.description:
A king among razorfish, and lord of the waters off the western Kholusian coast.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33319.name: Shadeshifter
33319.description:
A king among shapeshifters, and lord of the waters of Seagazer Shoals.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

33320.name: Nabaath Saw
33320.description:
A king among desert saws, and lord of the sands of the Nabaath Severance.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

33321.name: Dammroen Herring
33321.description:
A queen among cherry herring, and the lady of the waters of the Spoiled One.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33322.name: Celestial
33322.description:
A king among toadheads, and humbled lord of the waters of Father Collard's Failings.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33323.name: Deephaunt
33323.description:
A king among darkdwellers, and lord of the waters of Woven Oath.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33324.name: Golden Pipira
33324.description:
A queen among yellow pipira, and the lady of the waters of Mjrl's Tears.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

33325.name: Mora Tecta
33325.description:
A king among hoodwinkers, and lord of the waters of northwest Caliban Gorge.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

33326.name: Maru Crab
33326.description:
A king among yeti crabs, and lord of the waters of west Caliban Gap.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

33672.name: Bozjan Barding
33672.description: A suit of chocobo armor typical of those used by the Bozjan Resistance.

33673.name: Diamond Barding
33673.description: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble the Diamond Weapon.

33674.name: Antelope Doe Horn
33674.description: A small and slender horn that, when blown, will bring your antelope doe springing to your side.

33675.name: Antelope Stag Horn
33675.description: A large and elongated horn that, when blown, will bring your antelope stag springing to your side.

33684.name: Deinonychus Horn
33684.description: This horn of bone emits a primitive sound that summons forth your deinonychus to outwit your prey.

33687.name: Gilded Mikoshi Flute
33687.description: The trill of this fin-carved flute will summon a squad of gilded Namazu to bear you upon a gilded mikoshi─all of which is as gaudy as it sounds.

33688.name: Golden Ronkan Flute
33688.description: This whistle emits a sublime tone that summons forth the Resplendent Vessel of Ronka, pre-filled with divinity, majestic and blinding, for your worshipping convenience.

33691.name: Anteater
33691.description:
Definitely not a man-eater, otherwise that's what it would be called...right?

Use item to acquire the anteater minion.

33693.name: Magitek Predator F1
33693.description:
Comes complete with pilot and stands ready to wreak havoc among the enemy's ranks.

Use item to acquire the magitek predator F1 minion.

33695.name: Benben Stone
33695.description:
For when you need the top stone of a pyramid scampering around after you.

Use item to acquire the Benben stone minion.

33696.name: Wanderer's Campfire
33696.description:
Perfect for driving away the darkness and the chill and, most importantly, toasting marshmallows.

Use item to acquire the wanderer's campfire minion.

33706.name: Modern Aesthetics - Both Ways
33706.description:
The realm's premier publication on beauty and fashion, this specific copy of Modern Aesthetics covers, in detail, a hair styling technique which marries a braid and a side ponytail in an exquisite union.

Use to unlock a new hairstyle at the aesthetician.
Unavailable to Hrothgar.

33707.name: Modern Aesthetics - Battle-ready Bobs
33707.description:
The realm's premier publication on beauty and fashion, this specific copy of Modern Aesthetics covers, in detail, techniques for shaping an uncannily perfect bob─like that of your android acquaintance 2B.

Use to unlock a new hairstyle at the aesthetician.

33708.name: Modern Aesthetics - Scanning for Style
33708.description:
The realm's premier publication on beauty and fashion, this specific copy of Modern Aesthetics covers, in detail, techniques for attaining an uncannily effortless look─like that of your android acquaintance 9S.

Use to unlock a new hairstyle at the aesthetician.

33709.name: Magicked Prism (Namazu)
33709.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Releases a floating Namazu head, complete with gormless expression.

33710.name: Nymeia Potpourri
33710.description: Made from the alchemically treated petals of Nymeia lilies, this fragrant bundle of potpourri brings a sense of tranquility to even the most troubled souls.

33768.name: Forgotten Fragment of History
33768.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 16
Potential memories contained: Lodestone

33769.name: Forgotten Fragment of Rage
33769.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 16
Potential memories contained: Lost Stoneskin II, Lost Burst

33770.name: Forgotten Fragment of Ferocity
33770.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 16
Potential memories contained: Lost Stoneskin II, Lost Rampage

33771.name: Forgotten Fragment of Moonlight
33771.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 18
Potential memories contained: Light Curtain

33772.name: Forgotten Fragment of Hope
33772.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 18
Potential memories contained: Lost Reraise

33773.name: Forgotten Fragment of Artistry
33773.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 18
Potential memories contained: Lost Chainspell, Lost Assassination

33774.name: Forgotten Fragment of Desperation
33774.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 22
Potential memories contained: Lost Protect II, Lost Shell II

33775.name: Forgotten Fragment of Tenacity
33775.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 22
Potential memories contained: Lost Bubble

33776.name: Forgotten Fragment of Inspiration
33776.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 22
Potential memories contained: Lost Impetus

33777.name: Forgotten Fragment of Heroism
33777.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 25
Potential memories contained: Resistance Elixir, Lost Excellence

33778.name: Forgotten Fragment of Revelation
33778.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 25
Potential memories contained: Resistance Elixir, Lost Full Cure

33779.name: Forgotten Fragment of Cunning
33779.description:
A single, unidentified memory of the lost.

Resistance rank required for appraisal: 25
Potential memories contained: Resistance Elixir, Lost Blood Rage

33818.name: Faded Copy of In the Arms of War
33818.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing the full score for In the Arms of War.

33819.name: Diamond Plating
33819.description: A hunk of glistening metal torn from the Diamond Weapon.

33838.name: Peacelover's Attire Coffer
33838.description:
A banded chest containing a complete set of peacelover's attire.

Required level: 1. IL: 1. Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

33839.name: In the Arms of War Orchestrion Roll
33839.description: Music roll for In the Arms of War. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33840.name: Wrath of the Harrier Orchestrion Roll
33840.description: Music roll for Wrath of the Harrier. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33841.name: Seven Flames Orchestrion Roll
33841.description: Music roll for Seven Flames. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33842.name: Mourning Orchestrion Roll
33842.description: Music roll for Mourning. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33843.name: Emil (Despair) Orchestrion Roll
33843.description: Music roll for Emil (Despair). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33844.name: Kainé (Final Fantasy Main Theme Version) Orchestrion Roll
33844.description: Music roll for Kainé (Final Fantasy Main Theme Version). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33847.name: What Is Love? Orchestrion Roll
33847.description: Music roll for What Is Love?. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33848.name: By Design Orchestrion Roll
33848.description: Music roll for By Design. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33849.name: Freedom Orchestrion Roll
33849.description: Music roll for Freedom. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33850.name: A Better Tomorrow Orchestrion Roll
33850.description: Music roll for A Better Tomorrow. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33869.name: Frontier Cloth
33869.description: A bolt of highly durable cloth, ideal for use in garments worn when venturing into parts unknown.

33871.name: Ancient Bone
33871.description: Discovered in the ocean depths, it bears the marks of having the flesh stripped from the bone by wavekin.

33872.name: Rusted Suit of Armor
33872.description: Found half-submerged in the sand of the seabed, one cannot but wonder what fate befell its previous owner.

33873.name: Damaged Icebox
33873.description: Salvaged from the ocean floor, the ice and foodstuffs once held inside are long since gone. It can be surmised that it was the property of a wealthy seafarer with a penchant for chilled refreshments.

33905.name: Skyrise Orchestrion Roll
33905.description: Music roll for Skyrise. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33907.name: The Sound of the End: 8bit Orchestrion Roll
33907.description: Music roll for The Sound of the End: 8bit. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

33916.name: Grade 8 Dark Matter
33916.description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-90.]

33930.name: Piety Materia X
33930.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33931.name: Heavens' Eye Materia X
33931.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33932.name: Savage Aim Materia X
33932.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33935.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33936.name: Gatherer's Guile Materia X
33936.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33937.name: Gatherer's Grasp Materia X
33937.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33938.name: Craftsman's Competence Materia X
33938.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33939.name: Craftsman's Cunning Materia X
33939.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

33942.name: Quicktongue Materia X
33942.description: Cannot be melded onto a piece of equipment past the first advanced materia melding slot.

34550.name: Manganese Helm of the Behemoth King

34551.name: Manganese Armor of the Behemoth King
