34576.name: Scarlet Moko Robe of the White Griffin

34577.name: Kumbhiraskin Gloves of the White Griffin

34578.name: Scarlet Moko Chausses of the White Griffin

34579.name: Manganese Boots of the White Griffin

34580.name: Scarlet Moko Hood of the Black Griffin

34581.name: Scarlet Moko Robe of the Black Griffin

34582.name: Kumbhiraskin Gloves of the Black Griffin

34583.name: Scarlet Moko Chausses of the Black Griffin

34584.name: Manganese Boots of the Black Griffin

35424.name: Scarlet Moko Wedge Cap of Crafting

35434.name: AR-Caean Velvet Work Cap of Crafting

35435.name: AR-Caean Velvet Work Shirt of Crafting

35439.name: AR-Caean Velvet Trapper's Hat of Gathering

35555.name: Orchestrion Phonograph
35555.description:
A tabletop furnishing with a trumpetesque funnel designed to spread sweet melodies around a given space.

※One orchestrion of any type per estate only.

35556.name: Shoe Rack
35556.description: A stack of shelves suited for storing shoes.

35557.name: Ivy Mural
35557.description: A plant-patterned wall adornment for those who wish to bring a taste of the outside in.

35558.name: Table Mat
35558.description: A place setting that protects pristine dining surfaces from the grimy undersides of your plates.

35559.name: Matching Cushions
35559.description: A pair of fluffy pillows that support not only your neck and shoulders, but each other as well.

35560.name: Marimba
35560.description: A mallet-sounded instrument with an intricate design so beautiful as to rival its woody timbre.

35561.name: Indoor Oriental Waterfall
35561.description: A fabulous water feature that will bless any space with a touch of Far Eastern flair.

35562.name: Round Wooden Loft
35562.description: A circular platform for all of your platforming needs.

35563.name: Heavenly Ornamental Array
35563.description: A string of celestial lights for those who wish to gaze upon the night sky without craning their necks upward.

35564.name: Woodland Chair
35564.description: A seat that was lost in the woods, never to be reunited with its original owner.

35565.name: Apothecary's Workbench
35565.description: A wooden workspace filled with enough tonics and tinctures to make one's fire burn and cauldron bubble.

35566.name: Candlelit Sundries
35566.description: This trio of potted plant, letter frame, and waxen candle makes for the most charming fire hazard you'll see today.

35567.name: Fat Cat Rug
35567.description: A carpet almost as cozy as the fluffy familiar that inspired it.

35568.name: Walnut Flower Vases
35568.description: A stable set of wooden stands, each adorned with a brightly colored blossom.

35569.name: Fluffy Pancakes
35569.description: A two-tiered treat served with butter, powdered sugar, and a side of maple syrup. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Determination Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

35570.name: Stuffed Bom Boko
35570.description: A plush toy modeled after a raccoon dog pup honing its transformative skills.

35571.name: Wooden Blinds
35571.description: A set of wooden slats designed to keep interiors dim and idle hands a-dusting.

35573.name: Antique Wall Shelf
35573.description: A wooden shelf with a somewhat artificial antique appearance. After all, who can afford the real thing?

35574.name: Wooden Bin
35574.description: A container assembled from materials not much greater in quality than the waste that fills it.

35575.name: Imitation Wooden Skylight
35575.description: A ceiling fixture for those who prefer their sunlight simulated.

35576.name: Square Niche Partition
35576.description: There are two types of people: those who use this divider as storage space for cubic containers, and those who spend their time pretending to be a haunted portrait.

35577.name: Pendant Wall Light
35577.description: A chain-strung lamp whose diminutive glow prioritizes fashion over function.

35578.name: Loft Bed
35578.description: A bed-over-desk set for authors whose solution to writer's block is sleeping on it.

35579.name: Restaurant Showcase
35579.description: A cabinet filled with eerily realistic recreations of various dishes.

35580.name: Ruby Sea Phasmascape
35580.description: This advanced magitek contraption displays a dazzling sunset over the water betwixt Othard and Hingashi.

35581.name: Aurora Phasmascape
35581.description: This advanced magitek contraption displays Coerthan snowfields beautifully illuminated by the northern lights.

35582.name: Il Mheg Garden Fountain
35582.description: A petit water feature inspired by the land of the pixies.

35583.name: Hanging Bench
35583.description: A seat strung from a sturdy branch and securely fastened so to assuage any safety concerns.

35584.name: Coldbare Tree
35584.description: A plant bereft of its foliage and thus ill-fit to fend off the elements.

35585.name: Poroggo Lawn Ornament
35585.description: An adorable little waterwheel adorned with an even cuter amphibian familiar.

35586.name: Miniature Antique Clock Tower
35586.description: An outdoor clock that will always tell you the time─so long as you keep it wound.

35587.name: Shirogane Pinwheel
35587.description: A tiny spinning toy that is quite popular among Hingan children.

35608.name: Highland Cottage Permit (Wood)
35608.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style cottage in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 200 furnishing items.
※Small plot of land required.

35609.name: Highland Cottage Permit (Stone)
35609.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style cottage in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 200 furnishing items.
※Small plot of land required.

35610.name: Highland Cottage Permit (Composite)
35610.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style cottage in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 200 furnishing items.
※Small plot of land required.

35611.name: Highland House Permit (Wood)
35611.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style house in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 300 furnishing items.
※Medium plot of land required.

35612.name: Highland House Permit (Stone)
35612.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style house in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 300 furnishing items.
※Medium plot of land required.

35613.name: Highland House Permit (Composite)
35613.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style house in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 300 furnishing items.
※Medium plot of land required.

35614.name: Highland Mansion Permit (Wood)
35614.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style mansion in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 400 furnishing items.
※Large plot of land required.

35615.name: Highland Mansion Permit (Stone)
35615.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style mansion in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 400 furnishing items.
※Large plot of land required.

35616.name: Highland Mansion Permit (Composite)
35616.description:
Allows the construction of a Coerthan-style mansion in Empyreum.

※Can hold up to 400 furnishing items.
※Large plot of land required.

35744.name: Triteleia Seeds
35744.description:
The triteleia is also known as the triplet lily─as the various parts of the flower come in threes─care has been taken to ensure the number of seeds is divisible by three, so as not to ruin the pattern. After all, “three is the mandatory number,” as the saying probably goes.

※For use in planters.

35745.name: Red Triteleia
35745.description:
A bunch of red triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35746.name: Blue Triteleia
35746.description:
A bunch of blue triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35747.name: Yellow Triteleia
35747.description:
A bunch of yellow triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35748.name: Green Triteleia
35748.description:
A bunch of green triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35749.name: Orange Triteleia
35749.description:
A bunch of orange triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35750.name: Purple Triteleia
35750.description:
A bunch of purple triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35751.name: White Triteleia
35751.description:
A bunch of white triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35752.name: Black Triteleia
35752.description:
A bunch of black triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35753.name: Rainbow Triteleia
35753.description:
A bunch of multicolored triteleia, selectively fertilized to achieve a variety of vibrant colors.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

35791.name: Crystal of Eternal Darkness
35791.description: Brighten up your home with this charming tribute to the god of Darkness.

35792.name: Crystal of Divine Light
35792.description: Includes a unique serial number and certificate of authenticity supposedly signed by Hydaelyn Herself.

35793.name: Trophy of Eternal Darkness
35793.description: An ideal conversation piece and focal point for clandestine rituals. Though it does not possess any arcane properties, it certainly looks the part.

35794.name: Trophy of Divine Light
35794.description: A somewhat abstract imagining of the god of Light. Perhaps it is best to give it a wide berth to avoid snagging one's clothing─and eyes─on the featherlike projections.

35796.name: New World Burrito Lunch
35796.description: One of many delicious dishes invented by inhabitants of the New World, this lunch stars a well-seasoned assortment of beans, vegetables, and meats wrapped in soft tortillas. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Piety Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

35804.name: Thavnairian Striking Dummy
35804.description:
A striking dummy designed in the Thavnairian fashion.

※Up to three dummies may be placed in a single estate, regardless of type.

35809.name: Garlean Concrete Inner Wall
35809.description: A cold, stark interior wall for those who fear their home is becoming a little too cozy.

35810.name: Varied Wood Flooring
35810.description: This style of flooring is also known as “carpenters' leftovers.”

35811.name: Leafy Ceiling Lamp
35811.description: Ceiling-mounted lighting designed to resemble a ceiling-mounted, glowing bush.

35812.name: Small Cafe Walls
35812.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a café.

※Can only be used with cottages on small plots of land.

35813.name: Medium Cafe Walls
35813.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a café.

※Can only be used with cottages on medium plots of land.

35814.name: Large Cafe Walls
35814.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a café.

※Can only be used with cottages on large plots of land.

35833.name: Bicolor Gemstone Voucher
35833.description:
Proof that you have delivered many a bicolor gemstone.

Copies of the same bicolor gemstone voucher can be traded with Edelina in Mor Dhona for special items.

35970.name: Flag
35970.description:
A little reindeer with a huge appetite.

Use item to acquire the Flag minion.

35972.name: Wind-up Magus Sisters
35972.description:
Essentially three minions for one, so it represents great value.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Magus Sisters minion.

35973.name: Optimus Omicron
35973.description:
Minimum proportions, maximum performance.

Use item to acquire the optimus Omicron minion.

35974.name: Wind-up Anima
35974.description:
Warning: cannot be used to teleport or upgrade weapons.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Anima minion.

35977.name: Brave New Urianger
35977.description:
Despite its diminutive size, its arms are no less weapons than those of the man himself.

Use item to acquire the brave new Urianger minion.

35979.name: Hippo Calf
35979.description:
Heavy. Assisted lift may be required.

Use item to acquire the hippo calf minion.

35980.name: Crabe de la Crabe
35980.description:
If it were any crabbier, it would...probably still be a crab.

Use item to acquire the crabe de la crabe minion.

35981.name: Prince Lunatender
35981.description:
Use as a decoration at risk of suffering puncture wounds─lots of them.

Use item to acquire the Prince Lunatender minion.

35984.name: Adventure Basket
35984.description:
Because no one should have to save the world on an empty stomach.

Use item to acquire the adventure basket minion.

35986.name: Greener Gleaner
35986.description:
Good at hiding, but clearly not good enough.

Use item to acquire the greener gleaner minion.

35987.name: Wind-up Grebuloff
35987.description:
Smells vaguely like a rocky shore.

Use item to acquire the wind-up Grebuloff minion.

36003.name: Calydontis Horn
36003.description: When blown, this horn produces a feral sound that summons forth Calydontis, scourge of the forest.

36005.name: Wivre Horn
36005.description: When blown, this horn produces a deep, booming sound that summons forth your mighty wivre.

36011.name: Barding of Eternal Darkness
36011.description: A suit of chocobo armor that radiates Darkness.

36012.name: Barding of Divine Light
36012.description: A suit of chocobo armor that radiates Light.

36036.name: Archon Loaf
36036.description: Baked with either fish or vegetable flour, this fluffy loaf of rye bread is─from a nutritional standpoint─wholesome indeed. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36037.name: Zurek
36037.description: This filling rye soup is overflowing with soft vegetables and has a satisfyingly sour kick. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36038.name: Amra Salad
36038.description: This salad, tossed with light dressing and filled with chopped amra fruit, is a sweet and savory treat. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36039.name: Amra Lassi
36039.description: A blend of yoghurt and spices, this refreshing drink is infused with the mellow sweetness of the amra fruit. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36040.name: Island Miq'abob
36040.description: A skewer of hamsa breast and bell peppers grilled to perfection. This recipe was brought to the islands by way of Miqo'te seafarers. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36041.name: King Crab Cake
36041.description: Tender spiny king crab meat fills this crispy fried pastry which is topped with a spoonful of creamy herb-filled sauce. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36042.name: Ukha
36042.description: A fish and vegetable stew popular in Garlemald. The perfect meal for a snowy night spent indoors. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36043.name: Borscht
36043.description: A traditional red Garlean soup made of beetroot. Simple to cook, it is a great favorite in both civilian and military kitchens. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36044.name: Wine-dark Soup
36044.description: A creamy variety of beet soup─though no self-respecting Sharlayan would ever utilize such vulgar nomenclature. Ever. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36045.name: Glory Be Soup
36045.description: This stew, consisting of lentils and chestnuts boiled in red wine, derives its name from Garlean soldiers singing the praises of Emperor Solus, who shared a warm meal with them after a round of military exercises one chilly night. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36046.name: Happiness Juice
36046.description: This uniquely sweet drink consists of an entire squeezed carrot, along with an assortment of other scrumptious additions to give it a kick. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36047.name: Carrot Nibbles
36047.description: Ribbons of thinly sliced carrots of happiness dressed with vinegar make for a healthful and blissfully refreshing dish. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36048.name: Hamsa Curry
36048.description: A RadzatHan staple consisting of hamsa breast stewed to perfection in a spice-rich sauce. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36049.name: Karniyarik
36049.description: Topped with a single slice of tomato, this baked stuffed eggplant is positively bursting with hamsa meat and rich spices. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36050.name: Spicy Shakshouka
36050.description: A hearty and delicious dish for any mealtime, its base is a flavorful, rich tomato sauce filled with potent spices, in which an egg has been perfectly poached. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36051.name: Lentil Curry
36051.description: A dish that combines lentils with a sumptuous blend of spices in a silky coconut milk stew. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36052.name: Skyr
36052.description: A dairy dish created through a special Sharlayan fermentation process passed down for generations. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36053.name: Giant Haddock Dip
36053.description: A delectable dip made from a mixture of fish roe and mashed giant popoto. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36054.name: Yakow Moussaka
36054.description: A Near Eastern dish that takes yakow meat and eggplant and bakes them into a gratin. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36055.name: Philosopher's Sandwich
36055.description: Perfectly nutritionally balanced, this handheld dish is a busy Sharlayan researcher's best friend. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36056.name: Salted Thavnairian Cod
36056.description: A whole shallows cod, broiled and sprinkled with salt to bring out its fishy flavor. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36057.name: Coconut Cod Chowder
36057.description: A Near Eastern soup, brimming with shallows cod simmered in silky coconut milk. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36058.name: The Noodles of Elpis
36058.description: A creamy, cheesy pasta dish topped off with a decadent bird of Elpis egg. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36059.name: Giant Popoto Pancakes
36059.description: Giant popotoes are mashed, mixed with eggs, then cooked to create these light and fluffy treats. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36060.name: Tsai tou Vounou
36060.description: A herbal drink with impressive medicinal properties. Sometimes called “mountain tea.” EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36061.name: Sideritis Cookie
36061.description: A baked treat that gives off a sweet, herbal aroma. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36062.name: Elpis Deipnon
36062.description: This hearty dish takes ground bird of Elpis meat and sears it to tender, juicy perfection. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36063.name: Baked Alien Soup
36063.description: Alien onions are sautéed, simmered in a savory bouillon, then topped with crispy cheese for a simple yet satisfying meal. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36064.name: Sykon Salad
36064.description: The sykon serves as the star of this fruit-filled dish, complex and nutritious. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36065.name: Sykon Compote
36065.description: Sykon are boiled in sugar water to create these sweet, bite-sized treats. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36066.name: Sykon Bavarois
36066.description: Sliced sykon floats atop a fluffy bed of chilled gelatin in this tasty dessert. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36067.name: Archon Burger
36067.description: Concocted by the staff at the Last Stand, this sandwich is as nutritionally sound as it is delicious. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36068.name: Beef Stroganoff
36068.description: Choice cuts of meat are simmered in a savory sauce to create this Garlean specialty, the ideal supplement to one's squat regime. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36069.name: Pumpkin Ratatouille
36069.description: This colorful dish consists of a variety of vegetables, sautéed in perilla oil and then simmered to enrich their combined flavor. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36070.name: Pumpkin Potage
36070.description: A creamy soup that highlights the rich and nutty flavor of the giant pumpkin. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36071.name: Peach Juice
36071.description: A generous serving of juice, freshly squeezed from sweet peaches. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36072.name: Peach Tart
36072.description: A round pastry filled with sweet peaches and fragrant spices. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36073.name: Sykon Cookie
36073.description: A delicious treat covered in sykon jam and accented with a dash of cinnamon. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36074.name: Thavnairian Chai
36074.description: This milky Near Eastern tea is infused with cinnamon of peerless quality for a flavorsome kick. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36075.name: Scallop Salad
36075.description: A lush salad topped with exquisite scallops and lightly dressed with perilla oil. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36076.name: Scallop Curry
36076.description: Premium scallops are simmered with a rich blend of spices to create this savory dish. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

36077.name: Dark Rye Flour
36077.description: A fine flour made from dark rye.

36078.name: Northern Sea Salt
36078.description: A mineral-rich condiment made from Sharlayan rock salt.

36079.name: Perilla Oil
36079.description: A cooking oil made from Thavnairian perilla leaves.

36080.name: Palm Sugar
36080.description: A sweetener made from boiling down palm syrup.

36081.name: Garlean Cheese
36081.description: A fresh cheese known for both its rich yet refreshingly tangy flavor, as well as for the strict measures enacted to ensure its quality.

36082.name: Coconut Milk
36082.description: A liquid made from boiling the fruit's flesh and juice, then straining.

36083.name: Dark Rye
36083.description: A superlative grain cultivated over time to withstand disease and produce greater harvests.

36084.name: Sharlayan Rock Salt
36084.description: A bluish grey salt extracted from the islands of the northern seas.

36085.name: Thavnairian Perilla Leaf
36085.description: An annual herb, grown on the island of Thavnair and known for its superb medicinal properties.

36086.name: Palm Syrup
36086.description: A sweet sap extracted from the same trees that produce coconuts.

36087.name: Coconut
36087.description: In the southern seas, Lalafells will launch their brave comrades from catapults in order to fetch these palm seedlings from tall trees.

36088.name: Iceberg Lettuce
36088.description: A leafy, moisture-rich vegetable cultivated in Labyrinthos.

36089.name: Giant Popoto
36089.description: An alarmingly overgrown popoto suitable for raising hearty Lalafells. (Any Lalafells reading this may rest assured that this does not qualify as cannibalism.)

36090.name: Carrot of Happiness
36090.description: A nutrient-rich vegetable beloved by Loporrits. Just one nibble is enough to inspire feelings of euphoria.

36091.name: Cucumber
36091.description: Garleans will often pickle this vine-grown fruit and then drink the juice as a hangover cure.

36092.name: Eblan Lentils
36092.description: Legumes that grow well in cold climates.

36093.name: Beet
36093.description: A Garlean root vegetable that boasts a deep red color from its stem to its bulb.

36094.name: Sideritis Leaves
36094.description: The tea produced from this plant is somewhat bitter but possesses incredible medicinal properties.

36095.name: Elder Nutmeg Seeds
36095.description: An ancient spice that emits a sweet aroma. Used in cooking as well as in medicine.

36096.name: Sykon
36096.description: A fruit known as a symbol of vitality and the lushness of nature.

36097.name: Alien Onion
36097.description: A bizarre bulb that isn't actually an onion but looks vaguely reminiscent of one...

36098.name: Thavnairian Paprika
36098.description: A brightly colored pepper produced on the island of Thavnair.

36099.name: Butterbeef
36099.description: This marbled meat is so tender that it practically melts in one's mouth.

36100.name: Giant Pumpkin
36100.description: This gourd has been selectively cultivated and grown to a massive size─though many a La Noscean field hand would tell you they've seen bigger.

36101.name: White Peach
36101.description: A plump white peach highly sought after for its sweet aroma and rich flavor.

36102.name: Subtle Cinnamon Sticks
36102.description: Finely stripped sticks of cinnamon with a complex flavor detectable to well-developed palates.

36103.name: Glass Scallop
36103.description: This mollusk is known for its beautiful, shining shell and delicate flavor.

36104.name: Grade 5 Tincture of Strength
36104.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases strength for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36105.name: Grade 5 Tincture of Dexterity
36105.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases dexterity for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36106.name: Grade 5 Tincture of Vitality
36106.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases vitality for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36107.name: Grade 5 Tincture of Intelligence
36107.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases intelligence for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36108.name: Grade 5 Tincture of Mind
36108.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases mind for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36109.name: Grade 6 Tincture of Strength
36109.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases strength for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36110.name: Grade 6 Tincture of Dexterity
36110.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases dexterity for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36111.name: Grade 6 Tincture of Vitality
36111.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases vitality for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36112.name: Grade 6 Tincture of Intelligence
36112.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases intelligence for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36113.name: Grade 6 Tincture of Mind
36113.description: This diluted brew temporarily increases mind for twice the duration of similar potions. Duration: 30s

36114.name: Competent Craftsman's Draught
36114.description: This concoction is believed to improve crafting efficiency. Duration: 15m

36115.name: Commanding Craftsman's Draught
36115.description: This concoction is believed to improve crafting efficiency. Duration: 15m

36116.name: Cunning Craftsman's Draught
36116.description: This concoction is believed to improve crafting efficiency. Duration: 15m

36117.name: Magicked Prism (Spriggan)
36117.description: This peculiar contraption creates illusions by weaving together myriad shades of light. Lovingly crafted by the children of Menphina's Arms.

36119.name: Coeurl Beach Womenswear Coffer
36119.description:
A banded chest containing a flashy set of spotted swimwear.

Fits: All ♀
Cannot be opened in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36120.name: Coeurl Beach Menswear Coffer
36120.description:
A banded chest containing a flashy set of spotted swimwear.

Fits: All ♂
Cannot be opened in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36122.name: Paladin's Levin Arms
36122.description:
A set of arms containing a mighty Thunderstrike and mighty Thunderhead.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36123.name: Paladin's Endless Expanse Arms
36123.description:
A set of arms containing an endless Expanse sword and an endless Expanse shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36124.name: Paladin's Dead Hive Arms
36124.description:
A set of arms containing a dead Hive Shamshir and a dead Hive Scutum.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36125.name: Paladin's Fiend Arms
36125.description:
A set of arms containing a Blade of the Fiend and a Shield of the Fiend.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36126.name: Paladin's Horde Arms
36126.description:
A set of arms containing a seeing Horde blade and a seeing Horde shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36127.name: Paladin's Goddess Arms
36127.description:
A set of arms containing a Blade of the Goddess and a Shield of the Goddess.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36128.name: Paladin's Demon Arms
36128.description:
A set of arms containing a Blade of the Demon and a Shield of the Demon.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36129.name: Shinryu's Ephemeral Arms
36129.description:
A set of arms containing Shinryu's ephemeral longsword and Shinryu's ephemeral shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36130.name: Byakko's Enspirited Arms
36130.description:
A set of arms containing Byakko's enspirited stone sword and Byakko's enspirited shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36131.name: Tsukuyomi's Moonlit Arms
36131.description:
A set of arms containing Tsukuyomi's moonlit longsword and Tsukuyomi's moonlit shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36132.name: Suzaku's Flame-kissed Arms
36132.description:
A set of arms containing Suzaku's flame-kissed longsword and Suzaku's flame-kissed shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36133.name: Seiryu's Sanctified Arms
36133.description:
A set of arms containing Seiryu's sanctified longsword and Seiryu's sanctified shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36134.name: Paladin's Hades Arms
36134.description:
A set of arms containing an augmented Misos and an augmented Eulabeia.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36162.name: High Durium Sand
36162.description: Sand consisting of tiny grains of high durium.

36168.name: High Durium Nugget
36168.description: A small nugget of high durium.

36173.name: Lunar Adamantite Ingot
36173.description: An ingot of smelted lunar adamantite.

36174.name: Raw Ametrine
36174.description: An uncut, unpolished stone containing what appears to be ametrine.

36177.name: Raw Blue Zircon
36177.description: An uncut, unpolished stone containing what appears to be blue zircon.

36178.name: Raw Star Quartz
36178.description: An uncut, unpolished stone containing what appears to be star quartz.

36179.name: Rhodium Sand
36179.description: Sand consisting of tiny grains of rhodium.

36180.name: Chloroschist
36180.description: A crystalline schist formed in low temperatures and under little pressure.

36181.name: Annite
36181.description: A decent-sized chunk of rock made up of what appears to be thousands of thin sheets of dark grey crystal compacted together into a single mass.

36182.name: Ametrine
36182.description: A mix of amethyst and citrine.

36186.name: Star Quartz
36186.description: Almost appears to contain a star within when held up to the light.

36187.name: Rhodium Ingot
36187.description: An ingot of smelted rhodium. Shiny.

36188.name: Chloroschist Whetstone
36188.description: A green piece of schist used to sharpen metal or stone blades.

36189.name: Annite Whetstone
36189.description: A piece of carved annite used to sharpen metal or stone blades.

36190.name: Horse Chestnut Log
36190.description: A rough-cut log of horse chestnut timber.

36191.name: Palm Log
36191.description: A rough-cut log of palm timber.

36192.name: Red Pine Log
36192.description: A rough-cut log of red pine timber.

36193.name: Ironwood Log
36193.description: A rough-cut log of ironwood timber.

36194.name: Integral Log
36194.description: A rough-cut log of an unknown composite wood.

36195.name: Mempisang Log
36195.description: A rough-cut log of mempisang timber.

36200.name: Integral Lumber
36200.description: Processed lumber of an unknown composite wood.

36202.name: Dark Hemp
36202.description: Native to the islands of the north seas, the fibrous stem of this plant can be used to weave cloth.

36203.name: Almasty Fur
36203.description: A softer fur you have never known.

36204.name: Snow Flax
36204.description: Sourced from the northern reaches of Ilsabard.

36205.name: Scarlet Moko Grass
36205.description: An ancient species of moko grass which can be used to weave cloth.

36206.name: AR-Caean Cotton Boll
36206.description: A rare variety of cotton which has been beloved as long as you can remember...which is not very long, given that your mind goes blank each time you attempt to recall its origins.

36207.name: Golden Cocoon
36207.description: These shining cocoons are woven only by Thavnairian silkworms.

36208.name: Dark Hempen Cloth
36208.description: A sturdy fabric woven from dark hemp.

36209.name: Almasty Serge
36209.description: Warm fabric woven with the fur of an almasty.

36211.name: Scarlet Moko Cloth
36211.description: A fabric woven from scarlet moko grass.

36212.name: AR-Caean Velvet
36212.description: A rare fabric that delights mankind for unknown and possibly sinister reasons.

36213.name: Golden Silk
36213.description: A sleek and shining fabric woven from golden cocoons.

36214.name: Potent Spice
36214.description: Not for the weak of heart or palate, this powdered mixture of natural spices gives any dish a flavorsome kick.

36215.name: Stonehard Water
36215.description: Water so replete with minerals that drinking it unboiled is inadvisable, regardless of how appealing that may seem.

36216.name: Rime Dolomite
36216.description: This sample displays the particular dolomitization characteristic of the frozen wilds of Ilsabard.

36217.name: Double-edged Herb
36217.description: Incredibly potent, but also incredibly hard to find without getting lost in the woods and meeting an untimely end.

36218.name: Alchemical Charcoal
36218.description: A hot-burning fuel created by destructively distilling raw coal in the forges of the Great Work.

36219.name: Alchemical Abrasive
36219.description: This all-in-one abrasive, created by alchemists of the Great Work, can be used to both sand metals and polish them to a lustrous sheen─and with only minor risk of fire.

36220.name: Thavnairian Horsetail
36220.description: A robust grass grown on Thavnair, often used as an abrasive.

36221.name: Thavnairian Thread
36221.description: Beautiful thread of the sort Ruveydah Fibers prides itself on.

36222.name: Amynodon Hide
36222.description: The hide of an ancient creature that is envisioned as an amalgam of those less-primitive creatures that most people fear being trampled by.

36223.name: Moonlight Aethersand
36223.description: The coarse-grained, elementally aspected remnants of aetherially reduced matter.

36224.name: Endstone Aethersand
36224.description: The coarse-grained, elementally aspected remnants of highly concentrated aetherially reduced mineral matter.

36225.name: Endwood Aethersand
36225.description: The coarse-grained, elementally aspected remnants of highly concentrated aetherially reduced mineral matter.

36226.name: Endtide Aethersand
36226.description: The coarse-grained, elementally aspected remnants of highly concentrated aetherially reduced mineral matter.

36227.name: Grade 5 Strength Alkahest
36227.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to strength, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36228.name: Grade 5 Dexterity Alkahest
36228.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to dexterity, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36229.name: Grade 5 Vitality Alkahest
36229.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to vitality, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36230.name: Grade 5 Intelligence Alkahest
36230.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to intelligence, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36231.name: Grade 5 Mind Alkahest
36231.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to mind, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36232.name: Grade 6 Strength Alkahest
36232.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to strength, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36233.name: Grade 6 Dexterity Alkahest
36233.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to dexterity, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36234.name: Grade 6 Vitality Alkahest
36234.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to vitality, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36235.name: Grade 6 Intelligence Alkahest
36235.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to intelligence, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36236.name: Grade 6 Mind Alkahest
36236.description: When applied to items such as battle gear, this experimental alchemical liquid will dissolve away minute amounts of aether aspected to elements detrimental to mind, and by doing so, better attune the item and its wearer to the remaining beneficial elements.

36237.name: Enchanted High Durium Ink
36237.description: Ink containing high durium sand to improve its aetherial conduction.

36238.name: Enchanted Manganese Ink
36238.description: Ink containing powdered manganese sand to improve its aetherial conduction.

36239.name: Moon Gel
36239.description: A strong adhesive created by mixing together some mystery ingredients.

36240.name: Sungold Firesand
36240.description: A higher concentration of saltpeter makes this flammable powder slightly more explosive than normal firesand.

36241.name: Eblan Alumen
36241.description: An alumen sourced from the Eblan Rime.

36242.name: Gaja Hide
36242.description: The resilient hide of a gaja.

36243.name: Luncheon Toad Skin
36243.description: The slimy hide of a luncheon toad.

36244.name: Saiga Hide
36244.description: The heavy hide of a saiga.

36245.name: Kumbhira Skin
36245.description: The shiny hide of a kumbhira.

36246.name: Ophiotauros Hide
36246.description: The resilient hide of an ophiotauros.

36247.name: Gaja Leather
36247.description: A large piece of cured gaja hide.

36248.name: Luncheon Toad Leather
36248.description: A large piece of cured luncheon toad hide.

36249.name: Saiga Leather
36249.description: A large piece of cured saiga hide.

36250.name: Kumbhira Leather
36250.description: A large piece of cured kumbhira hide.

36251.name: Ophiotauros Leather
36251.description: A large piece of cured ophiotauros hide.

36252.name: Amynodon Leather
36252.description: A large piece of cured amynodon hide.

36253.name: Hamsa Tenderloin
36253.description: Tender breast meat that is hopefully not poisonous.

36254.name: Yakow Chuck
36254.description: A bit on the sinewy side, but highly nutritious.

36255.name: Ovibos Milk
36255.description: Possesses a unique taste one might not normally associate with milk.

36256.name: Egg of Elpis
36256.description: Birthed by a bird of Elpis, the hope within this egg seems unwilling to come out...

36258.name: Lunatender Blossom
36258.description: A lovely flower found blooming on a lunatender's crown.

36259.name: Dynamite Ash
36259.description: All that remains after dynamite explodes.

36260.name: Petalouda Scales
36260.description: Scales from the wings of a petalouda.

36261.name: Berkanan Sap
36261.description: A highly sticky substance obtained from a berkanan.

36262.name: Dynamis Crystal
36262.description: A golden crystal rich in dynamis.

36263.name: Ambrosial Water
36263.description: Such fresh rainwater can only be collected on the highest of high isles in the sky.

36264.name: Amra
36264.description: The signature fruit of Thavnair, the amra is often spotted clutched in the tail of a vajralangula.

36340.name: Fallen Angel Wings
36340.description: The perfect solution for anyone seeking a pair of edgier angel wings. Use to acquire a pair of fallen angel wings.

36341.name: Archangel Wings
36341.description: For those who go gaga for gold. Use to acquire a pair of archangel angel wings.

36343.name: Pixie Wings
36343.description: Perfect for those who like to indulge their mischievous side. Use to acquire a pair of pixie wings.

36347.name: Tower of Zot Orchestrion Roll
36347.description: Music roll for Tower of Zot (Endwalker). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36348.name: Garlemald Express Orchestrion Roll
36348.description: Music roll for Garlemald Express. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36349.name: As the Sky Burns Orchestrion Roll
36349.description: Music roll for As the Sky Burns. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36350.description: Music roll for Miracle Works. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36352.description: Music roll for Of Countless Stars. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36357.description: Music roll for Ancient Shackles. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36358.name: Hic Svnt Leones Orchestrion Roll
36358.description: Music roll for Hic Svnt Leones. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36367.name: Unbowed Orchestrion Roll
36367.description: Music roll for Unbowed. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36368.name: On Blade's Edge Orchestrion Roll
36368.description: Music roll for On Blade's Edge. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36369.name: Finality Orchestrion Roll
36369.description: Music roll for Finality. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36372.description: Music roll for Dawnbound. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36373.name: Roar of the Wyrm Orchestrion Roll
36373.description: Music roll for Roar of the Wyrm. Use to add to your orchestrion list.
