36374.description: Music roll for From the Depths. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

36378.name: Faded Copy of Endcaller
36378.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing the full score for Endcaller.

36379.name: Faded Copy of Your Answer
36379.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing the full score for Your Answer.

36385.name: Pecten
36385.description:
A sizable bivalve native to Scholar's Harbor.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36386.name: Northern Herring
36386.description:
A saltwater fish that serves as a staple in Sharlayan cuisine.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36387.name: Dog-faced Puffer
36387.description:
A saltwater fish recognized by its dark facial markings.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36388.name: Cobalt Chromis
36388.description:
This saltwater fish is prized for its brilliant blue hue.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36389.name: Guitarfish
36389.description:
A saltwater fish shaped like a stringed instrument.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36390.name: Astacus
36390.description:
A gaudy crustacean commonly found in Old Sharlayan.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36392.name: Peacock Bass
36392.description:
A decent-sized fish known for its speckled scales.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36393.name: Academician
36393.description:
A top-heavy fish commonly found in Oinops serves as a little-heeded warning of the consequences of overzealous study.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36394.name: Swordspine Snook
36394.description:
A silver-scaled fish that boasts surprising speed for its size.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36395.name: Ponderer
36395.description:
This fish is the presumed cause of no small amount of failed first-year essays asserting, “I swim, therefore I am.”

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36396.name: Tidal Dahlia
36396.description:
An anthozoan that enshrouds its body with petal-like appendages.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36397.name: Butterfly Fry
36397.description:
Labyrinthos researchers are currently studying reproductive patterns via these beautiful freshwater fish.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36398.name: Xenocypris
36398.description:
This unusually hardy freshwater koi is found throughout Labyrinthos.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36399.name: Topminnow
36399.description:
A tiny fish commonly found at Unmoved Source Alpha.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36400.name: Tessera
36400.description:
This cichlid doubles as a mosaic tile to the imaginative minds of Labyrinthos. (No fish were harmed in the making of this secret underground facility.)

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36402.name: Fat Snook
36402.description:
A freshwater fish recognizable by its golden brown fins.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36403.name: Prochilodus Luminosus
36403.description:
A freshwater fish whose scales boast an iridescent shimmer.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36404.name: Mesonauta
36404.description:
A freshwater fish marked by the large black stripe on its body.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36405.name: Greengill Salmon
36405.description:
This freshwater wavekin is bred for research purposes at the Mover Alpha.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36407.name: Raiamas
36407.description:
A freshwater fish known for its shimmering emerald scales.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36408.name: Red Bowfin
36408.description:
This ancient freshwater fish is, conveniently, now to be found in Unmoved Source Beta.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36409.name: Macrobrachium Lar
36409.description:
This freshwater shrimp was released into the waters near the Mover Beta as part of a biological study.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36410.name: Blowgun
36410.description:
Researchers are currently observing the life-cycle of this freshwater fish at the Mover Beta.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36411.name: Darksteel Knifefish
36411.description:
This freshwater fish is known for its considerable size and its charcoal color.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36412.name: Astacus Aetherius
36412.description:
A variant of astacus prized for its brilliant blue pigmentation.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36414.name: Labyrinthos Tilapia
36414.description:
Labyrinthos researchers employ this freshwater wavekin in studying the water quality in Deepmoat.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36415.name: Trunkblessed
36415.description:
This freshwater fish boasts a snout reminiscent of a Matanga's trunk.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36417.name: Seema Duta
36417.description:
If this freshwater fish from Meghaduta seems delicious, it's because it is. Dutifully served with a mega-sized portion of sauce in RadzatHan.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36418.name: Longear Sunfish
36418.description:
A freshwater fish named for the earlike protrusions on the sides of its face.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 2 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36419.name: Silver Characin
36419.description:
Only the satrap's family has been permitted to fish this freshwater goliath.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36420.name: Thavnairian Goby
36420.description:
This tiny saltwater fish is commonly found in the oceans surrounding Thavnair.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36421.name: Qeyiq Sole
36421.description:
This saltwater fish is flatter than many a boat's bottom.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36422.name: Gwl Crab
36422.description:
A cast of these crustaceans resembles an underwater rose.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36423.name: Pantherscale Grouper
36423.description:
A saltwater fish speckled with chocolate-brown splotches.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36425.name: Fate's Design
36425.description:
A tropical fish known for its dazzling coloration and unique scale patterns.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 2 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36426.name: Shadowdart Sardine
36426.description:
This black-bodied fish makes its homes in the seas surrounding Thavnair.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36427.name: Paksa Fish
36427.description:
This large saltwater fish has been honored with the name of an ancient Arkasodara ruler.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36430.name: Golden Barramundi
36430.description:
A saltwater fish known for its large, resplendent scales.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36431.name: Kadjaya's Castaway
36431.description:
A slim freshwater fish commonly found dancing its heart out at the Giantsgall Grounds.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36432.name: Marid Frog
36432.description:
This amphibian of unusual size makes its home in Thavnair's jungles.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36434.name: Bluegill
36434.description:
This voracious freshwater fish, once indigenous to the island, has long since found its way into Thavnair's water sources.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36435.name: Bronze Pipira
36435.description:
A ferocious freshwater fish commonly found at the Giantsgall Grounds.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36436.name: Green Swordtail
36436.description:
A long-tailed freshwater fish found throughout Thavnair.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36438.name: Ksirapayin
36438.description:
A freshwater fish that drinks deep of Ksiroda.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36439.name: Wakeful Watcher
36439.description:
This freshwater fish is said to be ever-vigilant reincarnation of a guard at the Wakeful Torana.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36440.name: Red Drum
36440.description:
A large freshwater fish identifiable by its black spots and crimson flourishes.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36441.name: Forgeflame
36441.description:
With its brightly colored fins, this fish evokes the image of metal on its way to becoming something greater.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36442.name: Bicuda
36442.description:
This fish, native to Ksiroda, is surprisingly swift for its size.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36443.name: Radzbalik
36443.description:
A freshwater fish beloved for its resplendent coloration.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 2 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36444.name: Half-moon Betta
36444.description:
This tropical fish is known for its fluttering tail fin.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36446.name: Banana Eel
36446.description:
A freshwater fish whose coloration, for better or worse, matches that of its fruitier namesake.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36447.name: Handy Hamsa
36447.description:
This small freshwater fish is named after the Thavnairian fowl it so adorably resembles─according to the Hannish, anyway.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36448.name: Flowerhorn
36448.description:
A colorful freshwater fish with an enormous hump on its head.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36449.name: Thavnairian Caiman
36449.description:
A large scalekin that makes its home in the Font of Maya, much to the area's other would-be residents' horror.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36450.name: Fiery Goby
36450.description:
This saltwater fish sputters along like a flickering flame.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36451.name: Puff-paya
36451.description:
A tiny saltwater fish whose catchy name is owed to its resemblance to the tropical fruit. 

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36452.name: Narunnairian Octopus
36452.description:
A cephalopod commonly found in the ocean around Narunnair.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36453.name: Roosterfish
36453.description:
A saltwater fish with a spindly dorsal fin that makes its home in the Perfumed Tides.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 3 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36454.name: Basilosaurus
36454.description:
This scourge of the seas bears physiological similarities to prehistoric whales.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 4 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

36456.name: Eblan Trout
36456.description:
A freshwater trout capable of surviving freezing temperatures, and likely the more delicious for it.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36457.name: Animulus
36457.description:
A curious sort of creature that calls the Eblan Thaw home.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36458.name: Cerule Core
36458.description:
An orb of a creature with a penchant for ceruleum-laced water.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36459.name: Icepike
36459.description:
A freshwater fish covered with nigh-impenetrable scales that no mere mortal could ever break through─bare-handed, anyway.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36460.name: Dark Crown
36460.description:
A fish whose long, beautiful fin ensures it stands out at all times. If it had the cognitive capacity, it would no doubt be so vain.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36461.name: Imperial Pleco
36461.description:
A striped fish which can be seen flitting about the waters of the capital, much to its people's chagrin.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36462.name: Bluetail
36462.description:
A large fish boasting a color as bracing as ice.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36463.name: Star-blue Guppy
36463.description:
A terribly small freshwater fish with a color reminiscent of a certain star.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36465.name: Lunar Cichlid
36465.description:
A freshwater wavekin that, even when removed from its natural habitat, seems forever kissed by the light of the moon.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36466.name: Teareye
36466.description:
This fish cannot help but appear gloomy day in and day out. Whether it actually is or not is a matter of hot debate among fish enthusiasts everywhere.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36467.name: Replipirarucu
36467.description:
An aberration with scales of a pinkish hue.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36468.name: Feverfish
36468.description:
Within the aetherochemical pools it calls home, this bizarre wavekin consumes toxic substances like they are going out of style.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36470.name: Calicia
36470.description:
In aetherochemical environments, this wavekin's coloration is reminiscent of a wine-filled chalice. The rest of the time, it is entirely uninteresting.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36471.name: Protomyke #987
36471.description:
A variety of fungus identified in the Chlorophospond, and deceptively unintelligent even given the low expectations such a description establishes.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36472.name: Lunar Deathworm
36472.description:
A menace of a mollusk with a mouth that is not the least bit inviting.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

36473.name: Fleeting Brand
36473.description:
This lengthy, parasitic fish loves to lurk in regotoise shells, always ducking just out of sight and reach before being plucked.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36475.name: Regotoise
36475.description:
A large turtle who blends so seemlessly into his surroundings, you may not even notice it until you trip over it.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36476.name: Isle Skipper
36476.description:
These tiny fish spend a deal of time in the open sky, almost as if they wish to have been born birds instead.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36477.name: Iribainion
36477.description:
This freshwater fish creates rainbows whenever it breaches the surface.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36478.name: Albino Loach
36478.description:
A freshwater fish whose scales gleam with an uncommon luster.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36479.name: Golden Shiner
36479.description:
This fish is best appreciated by gazing upon the water in which it swims, so there is little use in trying to get a good look at it─or even reading this text.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36480.name: Mangar
36480.description:
Some might say this fish is made of money. They would be wrong.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36481.name: Dermogenys
36481.description:
A small, pale fish with a snout that is hard to ignore. Testing to determine whether it is self-conscious has thus far been inconclusive.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 1 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36484.name: Antheia
36484.description:
A freshwater fish sporting a fine array of pigments─presumably the maximum amount possible without causing pain to onlookers. That seems like something the ancients would do.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36485.name: Colossoma
36485.description:
This impressive specimen can be found lingering among the aquatic vegetation in the lower Hungering Gardens.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36487.name: Superstring
36487.description:
A creature whose tentacles seem inexplicably alive with cosmic phenomena.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36488.name: Star Eater
36488.description:
Typically found within aetherochemical pools, this creature is capable of luring a horrifically wide variety of unsuspecting prey with its luminescent organ.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36489.name: Vacuum Shrimp
36489.description:
A cosmic crustacean whose black body blends in with the inky darkness of space.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36491.name: Cosmic Noise
36491.description:
These wavekin and their dizzying pattern of scales are oft found in aetherochemical pools.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36492.name: Glassfish
36492.description:
This fish appears dead on arrival to the untrained eye, and thus would be best sold to someone with a trained eye.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36494.name: Foun Myhk
36494.description:
A creature with several impressive qualities that have failed to better its life in any meaningful way.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36495.name: Dragonscale
36495.description:
This symbiont is a boon to dragons' grooming habits.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36496.name: Ypupîara
36496.description:
This disturbing life-form may have once been bipedal, but those days are long gone.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36497.name: Eehs Forhnesh
36497.description:
This wavekin's name means “devourer of eggs,” and it fully looks the part.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

36499.name: Katoptron
36499.description:
A mystifying fish whose scales seem to reflect the movement of the stars.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36501.name: Comet Tail
36501.description:
This creature appears to be part shooting star, part lungfish─and for all you know, it is.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36502.name: Aoide
36502.description:
This wavekin makes up in sound what it lacks in sight.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36503.name: Protoflesh
36503.description:
One of many physical test-bodies created by the Ea.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36505.name: Wandering Starscale
36505.description:
These wavekin behave as if deviating from their invisible track will have dire consequences...which is unfortunate for this one, if true.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36506.name: Wormhole Worm
36506.description:
A mollusk whose rainbow shimmer hides inscrutable─and potentially sinister─innards.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36507.name: Unidentified Flying Biomass II
36507.description:
A tiny, yet highly mobile, life-form.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36508.name: Triaina
36508.description:
This crustacean was an apex predator on its home world. Now...not so much.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36509.name: Sophos Deka-okto
36509.description:
A life-form with six eyes, six feelers, and a whole lot of terrifying wisdom to impart.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36510.name: Class Twenty-four
36510.description:
A creature from Ostrakon Hepta with twenty-four legs and twenty spines, which in this context means it is rather full of itself.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36511.name: Terrifyingway
36511.description:
This creature of the cosmos might be known for its adorable ears─save for the fact that they are actually legs.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36512.name: Alien Mertone
36512.description:
A devious alien life-form hailing from an unknown plane, come to our universe to invade even more stars. Maybe.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36513.name: Monster Carrot
36513.description:
The Loporrits claim this creature resembles their favorite snack─though why they would wish to make that association is anyone's guess.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36514.name: Argonaut
36514.description:
An alien crustacean which traverses the stars by expelling aether.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36515.name: Echinos
36515.description:
This spheroid from the stars is covered not only in spines, but scale-like bone matter.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36516.name: Space Bishop
36516.description:
This alien life-form appears to have been hung out to dry for a few moons too long.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36517.name: Alyketos
36517.description:
A primordial wanderer capable of walking on land with its stunted legs─presumably for the purpose of harrying other species, but who can say?

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

36518.name: Horizon Event
36518.description:
This truly incomprehensible creature has likely seen its fair share of cosmic horrors.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36519.name: E.B.E.-9318
36519.description:
An astoundingly alien alien hailing from a dimension beyond our comprehension.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36520.name: Unbegotten
36520.description:
This mysterious entity may well be the spirit of some sentient being, couched in protoplasm and drifting through the cosmos, but there is absolutely no way to know.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36521.name: Phallaina
36521.description:
An enormous cosmic whale that swims through the stars on diffuse currents of aether.

[Suitable for printing on extra large canvases.]

36522.name: Thavnairian Cucumber
36522.description:
Found on the shoals of Thavnair, it is as if this spiny creature lurks in wait for unsuspecting feet.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36523.name: Spiny King Crab
36523.description:
A crustacean covered head to pincers in painful spines.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36524.name: Thavnairian Eel
36524.description:
A saltwater eel which slithers about the shoals of Thavnair.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36525.name: Gilled Topknot
36525.description:
A tropical fish with sizable fins that protrude perhaps a little too far from its body.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36526.name: Purusa Fish
36526.description:
Living off the coast of Thavnair, these fish are capable of creating their own electrical currents.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36527.name: Giantsgall Jaw
36527.description:
This carnivorous fish and its peculiar scales trick the eye to appear as naught but stone.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36528.name: Akyaali Sardine
36528.description:
This silver wavekin is scooped up by the school in the seas around Thavnair.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36529.name: Spicy Pickle
36529.description:
A peculiar and prickly creature which calls the seas surrounding Thavnair home. Occasionally found inside out.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36530.name: Mayavahana
36530.description:
A saltwater fish with a sail-like fin that acts as a sort of natural dousing mechanism for aether.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36531.name: Hedonfish
36531.description:
Dotted with very fine spots, this saltwater fish appears at first blush to have been caught in some sort of net.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36532.name: Satrap Trapfish
36532.description:
Living in the waters around Thavnair, this deep-sea wavekin is so fearsome-looking as to be the source of at least a fable or two.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36533.name: Blue Marlin
36533.description:
A large saltwater fish whose lustrous skin seems to shimmer even without sunlight.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36534.name: Satrap's Whisper
36534.description:
Almost invisible is this jellyfish as it floats serenely through the seas.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36535.name: Tebqeyiq Smelt
36535.description:
For every vivid specimen of this species found, there is another far less interesting to look upon─but such is the nature of tropical fish.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36536.name: Shallows Cod
36536.description:
A saltwater fish which tucks itself away in the shadowy portions of shoals.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36537.name: Meyhane Reveler
36537.description:
The beauty of this saltwater fish is of great interest to the people of Thavnair─and even greater interest to travelers passing through.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36538.name: Daemir's Alloy
36538.description:
A large saltwater fish which can be found in the Great Runoff.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36539.name: Rasa Fish
36539.description:
This wavekin's scales are so beautiful that they appear wrought from copper, and as such it fetches a rather impressive price at market.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36540.name: Agama's Palm
36540.description:
A crustacean found in the Font of Maya.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36541.name: Rummy-nosed Tetra
36541.description:
A crimson-faced wavekin which has found a home in the Font of Maya.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36542.name: Monksblade
36542.description:
A wavekin with a body as keen as a polearm's edge.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36543.name: Atamra Cichlid
36543.description:
The red of this tropical wavekin is reminiscent of a certain fruit.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36544.name: Root of Maya
36544.description:
A variety of eel which keeps to the darker depths of the Font of Maya.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36545.name: Floral Snakehead
36545.description:
A giant tropical wavekin sporting a fascinating pattern.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36546.name: Xiphactinus
36546.description:
Since time immemorial, this creature has terrorized waterways with its piercing teeth and powerful jaw.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36547.name: Dusky Shark
36547.description:
An enormous beast which can be found placidly swimming in warm waters.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36548.name: Coffer Shell
36548.description:
A bivalve found in the Ruby Sea that practically invites one to slip it into one's pocket.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36549.name: Onihige
36549.description:
Do not let its size fool you─this fish is a terror of the seas. Mainly because of its appearance.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36550.name: Onokoro Carp
36550.description:
This otherwise average wavekin would never be caught dead in less temperate climes.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36551.name: Ruby-spotted Crab
36551.description:
Though this crab advertises its toxicity with its bright and spotted carapace, some people just never learn.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36552.name: Marrow-eater
36552.description:
A bottom-feeder in the most literal sense, this fish can be found on the seafloor munching on all manner of carrion.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36553.name: Cloudy Catshark
36553.description:
A variety of two-toned shark that should never be kept as a pet.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36554.name: Red Gurnard
36554.description:
One always knows when this saltwater fish is coming thanks to its vivid blue-tinged fins.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36555.name: Dream Pickle
36555.description:
Lucky are the Isari fishermen who can catch and sell this creature.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36556.name: Ruby Haddock
36556.description:
One can find schools of these wavekin eking out an existence in the depths of the Ruby Sea.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36557.name: Crown Fish
36557.description:
If one were judging by appearances alone, the marking around this fish's face would make it ruler of the seas. Alas, in the real world, the best it can hope for is to not be confused with the common clown fish.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36558.name: Sword of Isari
36558.description:
This imposing ancient creature can be found around Isari.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36559.name: Blue Shark
36559.description:
A shark with migratory habits that extend from the wide open ocean throughout the Ruby Sea.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36560.name: Barb of Exile
36560.description:
A variety of seahorse living in the deepest part of the Ruby Sea.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36561.name: Smooth Lumpfish
36561.description:
A white saltwater creature with a round body and a texture than can only be described as thoroughly unsettling.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36562.name: Hells' Cap
36562.description:
This flat, disc-shaped fish can be found in the hottest parts of the Ruby Sea.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36563.name: Keeled Fugu
36563.description:
Living within the abyssal zone, this fish is much smaller than it leads its predators to believe.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 2 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36564.name: Eastern Seerfish
36564.description:
A wavekin found swimming the seas of the Far East.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36565.name: False Fusilier
36565.description:
This saltwater fish bears strong resemblance to both true fusiliers and squashed Far Eastern plums, but it is neither.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36566.name: Skipping Stone
36566.description:
A diminutive wavekin living in the shallows northeast of Bekko.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36567.name: Red-spotted Blenny
36567.description:
This white saltwater wavekin is flecked with spots, as if a painter flicked their brush at it.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36568.name: Othardian Wrasse
36568.description:
A saltwater creature known for its beautiful coloration.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36569.name: Grey Mullet
36569.description:
This sea-dwelling creature is not an uncommon a sight in the waters of the Far East.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36570.name: Prayer Cushion
36570.description:
It is something of a marvel to watch these pale wavekin glide effortlessly through the sea.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36571.name: Deepbody Boarfish
36571.description:
These saltwater wavekin are known far and wide for their unique shape and bright color.

[Suitable for display in aquariums tier 2 and higher.]
[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36572.name: Jointed Razorfish
36572.description:
This tiny creature, with its peculiar swimming habits, stands out more than it likely wishes to.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36573.name: Pipefish
36573.description:
A long, red saltwater wavekin embellished with a white underbelly.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36574.name: Righteye Flounder
36574.description:
A russet-colored kin of the flounder.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36575.name: Mini Yasha
36575.description:
A saltwater wavekin with distinctive red and amber coloration.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36576.name: Sawshark
36576.description:
With its saw-shaped snout, one would be hard-pressed to consider this shark inconspicuous.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36577.name: Othardian Lumpsucker
36577.description:
A deep-sea wavekin with fins that will cling desperately to just about anything to avoid swimming.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36578.name: Shogun's Kabuto
36578.description:
So curious is the shape of this creature's skull, one cannot help but want to wear it.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36579.name: Bluefin Trevally
36579.description:
The sparkling blue of its fins sets this wavekin apart.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36580.name: Kitefin Shark
36580.description:
A shark with shining, surreal eyes that stand out like gems against the dull background of its body.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36581.name: Uzumaki
36581.description:
One would not be alone in saying this primordial beast haunts their dreams.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36582.name: Natron Puffer
36582.description:
A wavekin which keeps to the deeper portions of Loch Seld.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36583.name: Diamond Dagger
36583.description:
This wavekin enjoys higher levels of salinity than most.

[Suitable for printing on small canvases.]

36584.name: Queenly Fan
36584.description:
Creatures which adorn themselves with glimmering gems of salt.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36585.name: Pale Panther
36585.description:
A variety of eel with a monochrome pattern covering its body.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36586.name: Saltsquid
36586.description:
A massive squid that calls Loch Seld home.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36587.name: Platinum Hammerhead
36587.description:
The apex predator of the lochs, this shark can be found skimming the depths in search of prey.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36588.name: Gold Salmon Roe
36588.description: Salmon eggs that glisten in the sunlight. Live bait for freshwater fishing.

36589.name: Leech
36589.description: Not as bloodthirsty as you might think. Live bait for freshwater fishing.

36590.name: Sky Spoon Lure
36590.description: A metal lure shaped like a spoon so it will oscillate when dragged through the water, attracting fish. Especially effective in lakes.

36591.name: Mayfly
36591.description: A short-lived thin insect. Live bait for freshwater fishing.

36592.name: Shrimp Ball
36592.description: A ball of shrimp and rye flour paste. Processed bait for saltwater fishing.

36593.name: Mackerel Strip
36593.description: A thin piece of mackerel flesh. Live(ish) bait for ocean fishing.

36594.name: Grey Worm
36594.description: An oddball worm with a taste for waters of an altogether stranger variety. Live bait for aetherfishing.

36595.name: Chimera Worm
36595.description: An altered moth larva. Live bait for aetherfishing.

36596.name: Panic Jig
36596.description: A lure with a shape so terrifying it sends anything that sees it into a state of abject panic. Especially effective for starfishing.

36597.name: Stardust
36597.description: The stuff dreams are made of. Bait for starfishing.

36611.name: Timeworn Saigaskin Map
36611.description: This bottle holds a timeworn map classified as risk-reward grade 13 among treasure hunters. ※Use the action Decipher to extract the map and examine its contents. ※Level 90 recommended.

36612.name: Timeworn Kumbhiraskin Map
36612.description: This bottle holds a timeworn map classified as risk-reward grade 14 among treasure hunters. ※Use the action Decipher to extract the map and examine its contents. ※Level 90 full party (eight players) recommended.

36615.name: Paladin's Arms of the Round
36615.description:
A set of arms containing a Sword of the Round and a Shield of the Round.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

36627.name: Luxurious Paper
36627.description: Paper of such fine quality, it would be a shame to tarnish it with ink, no matter how skillful the penmanship.

36628.name: Cloth of Happiness
36628.description: Guaranteed to bring you eternal happiness if its name is anything to go by.

36629.name: Phonograph Plate
36629.description: A specially treated metal sheet used in the construction of phonographs. Even the slightest imperfection can lead to all sorts of ghastly noises being produced.

36630.name: Bird of Elpis Breast
36630.description: The most tender meat this bird has to offer.

36637.name: Royal Lunatender
36637.description:
All that glitters is not gold. It could also be a lunatender.

Use item to acquire the royal lunatender minion.

36679.name: Aetherolectric Guitarfish
36679.description:
A king among guitarfish, and lord of the waters of Scholar's Harbor.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36680.name: Jumbo Snook
36680.description:
A king among fat snook, and lord of the waters of Unmoved Source Alpha.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36681.name: Earful
36681.description:
A king among longear sunfish, and lord of the waters of Meghaduta.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36682.name: Hippo Frog
36682.description:
A king among marid frogs, and lord of the Giantsgall Grounds.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36683.name: Rimepike
36683.description:
A king among icepike, and lord of the waters of the Eblan Thaw.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36684.name: Foun Ahlm
36684.description:
A king among foun myhks, and lord of Apohelos 18-β.

[Suitable for printing on large canvases.]

36685.name: Forbiddingway
36685.description:
A king among terrifyingways, and lord of Limne 18.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36686.name: Thavnairian Calamari
36686.description:
A squid commonly featured in popular Thavnairian cuisine.

[Suitable for printing on medium canvases.]

36849.name: Bluefeather Barding
36849.description: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble a devastating blue bird.

36852.name: Wind-up Kangaroo
36852.description:
Always has a spring in its step.

Use item to acquire the wind-up kangaroo minion.

36854.name: Teacup Kapikulu
36854.description:
Small but eager to work.

Use item to acquire the teacup Kapikulu minion.

36855.name: Chewy
36855.description:
Take care not to drown in its literal puppy dog eyes.

Use item to acquire the Chewy minion.

36856.name: Clockwork Novus D
36856.description:
Deftly driven by an unspecified (but doubtless incomparably brilliant) man.

Use item to acquire the clockwork Novus D minion.

36860.name: Blue-footed Booby
36860.description:
A terror from beak to tailfeather.

Use item to acquire the blue-footed booby minion.

36863.name: Highland Cottage Roof (Wood)
36863.description: A highland wooden roof designed exclusively for use with cottages.

36864.name: Highland Cottage Roof (Stone)
36864.description: A highland stone roof designed exclusively for use with cottages.

36865.name: Highland Cottage Roof (Composite)
36865.description: A highland composite roof designed exclusively for use with cottages.

36866.name: Highland House Roof (Wood)
36866.description: A highland wooden roof designed exclusively for use with houses.

36867.name: Highland House Roof (Stone)
36867.description: A highland stone roof designed exclusively for use with houses.

36868.name: Highland House Roof (Composite)
36868.description: A highland composite roof designed exclusively for use with houses.

36869.name: Highland Mansion Roof (Wood)
36869.description: A highland wooden roof designed exclusively for use with mansions.

36870.name: Highland Mansion Roof (Stone)
36870.description: A highland stone roof designed exclusively for use with mansions.

36871.name: Highland Mansion Roof (Composite)
36871.description: A highland composite roof designed exclusively for use with mansions.

36872.name: Highland Cottage Wall (Wood)
36872.description: A highland wooden wall designed exclusively for use with cottages.

36873.name: Highland Cottage Wall (Stone)
36873.description: A highland stone wall designed exclusively for use with cottages.

36874.name: Highland Cottage Wall (Composite)
36874.description: A highland composite wall designed exclusively for use with cottages.

36875.name: Highland House Wall (Wood)
36875.description: A highland wooden wall designed exclusively for use with houses.

36876.name: Highland House Wall (Stone)
36876.description: A highland stone wall designed exclusively for use with houses.

36877.name: Highland House Wall (Composite)
36877.description: A highland composite wall designed exclusively for use with houses.

36878.name: Highland Mansion Wall (Wood)
36878.description: A highland wooden wall designed exclusively for use with mansions.

36879.name: Highland Mansion Wall (Stone)
36879.description: A highland stone wall designed exclusively for use with mansions.

36880.name: Highland Mansion Wall (Composite)
36880.description: A highland composite wall designed exclusively for use with mansions.

36881.name: Highland Classical Window
36881.description: A classical window in the highland style.

36882.name: Highland Lancet Window
36882.description: A lancet window in the highland style.

36883.name: Highland Oblong Window
36883.description: An oblong window in the highland style.

36884.name: Highland Wooden Door
36884.description: A wooden door in the highland style.

36885.name: Highland Ornate Door
36885.description: An ornate door in the highland style.

36886.name: Highland Classical Door
36886.description: A classical door in the highland style.

36887.name: Highland Interior Wall
36887.description: An interior wall designed to complement highland residences.

36888.name: Highland Flooring
36888.description: Floorboards designed to complement highland residences.

36889.name: Highland Pendant Lamp
36889.description: A pendant lamp designed to complement highland residences.

36890.name: Deluxe Highland Pendant Lamp
36890.description: A large pendant lamp designed to complement highland residences.

36891.name: Highland Chandelier
36891.description: A sumptuous chandelier designed to complement highland residences.

36892.name: Highland Composite Chimney
36892.description: A composite chimney designed to complement highland residences.

36893.name: Highland Rounded Chimney
36893.description: A rounded chimney designed to complement highland residences.

36894.name: Highland Stone Chimney
36894.description: A stone chimney designed to complement highland residences.

36895.name: Highland Wooden Awning
36895.description: A sturdy wooden awning designed to complement highland residences.

36896.name: Highland Stone Awning
36896.description: A sturdy stone awning designed to complement highland residences.

36897.name: Highland Composite Awning
36897.description: A sturdy composite awning designed to complement highland residences.

36898.name: Highland Placard
36898.description: A handsome placard designed to complement highland residences.

36899.name: Highland Hanging Placard
36899.description: A hanging placard designed to complement highland residences.

36900.name: Highland Banner
36900.description: A handsome banner designed to complement highland residences.

36901.name: Highland Stone Wall
36901.description: A stone wall designed to complement highland residences. Mix and match at your own peril.

36902.name: Highland Fence
36902.description: An arched stone fence designed to complement highland residences. Mix and match at your own peril.

36903.name: Highland Potting Fence
36903.description: A stone potting fence designed to complement highland residences. Mix and match at your own peril.

36904.name: Troll Horn
36904.description: When blown, this horn produces an untamed sound that calls your towering troll to your side.

36906.name: Alkonost Whistle
36906.description: This whistle emits a shrill tone that summons your alkonost to your side.

37278.name: Thavnairian Corn
37278.description: A selectively bred variant cultivated from the maize once brought to Thavnair from the New World. Valued for its nutritional value and alchemical uses alike.

37279.name: Raw Eblan Danburite
37279.description: An uncut, unpolished stone containing what appears to be Eblan danburite.

37280.name: Eblan Danburite
37280.description: A transparent jewel sourced from the Eblan Rime.

37281.name: Hannish Fiber
37281.description: An alchemically created bundle of fine, plant-based material.

37282.name: Calamari Ripieni
37282.description: Fresh squid stuffed with a vibrant array of vegetables and cheese, then simmered to perfection in dry white wine. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

37283.name: Kalamarakia Tiganita
37283.description: Thick slices of squid coated in spiced dark rye flour, then fried in perilla oil until crispy. EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

37284.name: Immutable Solution
37284.description: Whatever else happens, you can always rely on this substance─whatever it is─not to change.

37302.name: Byregotia Seeds
37302.description:
They say it is by Byregot's very hand that these flowers are coaxed to blossom...but you should still water them nevertheless.

※For use in planters.

37303.name: Red Byregotia
37303.description:
A bunch of red Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37304.name: Blue Byregotia
37304.description:
A bunch of blue Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37305.name: Yellow Byregotia
37305.description:
A bunch of yellow Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37306.description:

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37307.name: Orange Byregotia
37307.description:
A bunch of orange Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37308.name: Purple Byregotia
37308.description:
A bunch of purple Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37309.name: White Byregotia
37309.description:
A bunch of white Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37310.name: Black Byregotia
37310.description:
A bunch of black Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37311.name: Rainbow Byregotia
37311.description:
A bunch of multicolored Byregotia, selectively fertilized to achieve their vibrant color.

Bouquets can be placed within select vases for display in estates.

37333.name: Susano's Rapturous Arms
37333.description:
A set of arms containing Susano's rapturous longsword and Susano's rapturous shield.

Cannot be used in instanced areas such as dungeons, PvP areas, or raids.

37344.name: Gingerbread Cottage Walls
37344.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a delicious gingerbread cottage.

※Can only be used with cottages on small plots of land.

37345.name: Gingerbread House Walls
37345.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a delicious gingerbread house.

※Can only be used with houses on medium plots of land.

37346.name: Gingerbread Mansion Walls
37346.description:
A set of four walls designed for those who wish to transform their estate into a delicious gingerbread mansion.

※Can only be used with mansions on large plots of land.

37347.name: Classic Dresser
37347.description: A lavish vanity that hearkens back to days long past.

37348.name: Log Rack
37348.description: A lovely rack to organize your logs.

37349.name: Indoor Marble Fountain
37349.description: A fountain carved from deep-sea marble and whimsically decorated with Moogle statuettes.

37351.name: Ornamental Crystal Array
37351.description: A decorative wall ornament dripping with jewels.

37352.name: Log Pillar
37352.description: A decorative wooden pillar designed to resemble the tree it came from.

37353.name: Kweh-kweh Clock
37353.description: A charming chronometer designed to alert you of the time with a rousing “Kweh-kweh!” at convenient intervals. Recommended to those plagued by unwanted fits of napping.

37354.name: Small Blackboard
37354.description: Experience the joy of slapping two dusty erasers together again and again. And again.

37355.name: Eastern Canopy Bed
37355.description: Sleep in luxury under a canopy of softly blooming flowers from the Far East. Be advised that sleepers may or may not wake up subsumed in petals.

37356.name: Wondrous Parfait
37356.description: A massive dessert layered with plenty of fresh fruit, whipped cream, and frozen confectionary. Strangely enough, it never seems to melt. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Spell Speed Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus: +3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

37357.name: Eulmoran Divan
37357.description: A cushioned settee expressly designed for contemplating one's more opulent sins.

37358.name: Sweetfish Skewers
37358.description: Lightly salted and roasted to perfection, these sweetfish skewers make for a simple-yet-sublime snack. ※Cannot be retrieved once used. ※Can be used up to 10 times. Meal benefits when used: Critical Hit Bonus: +4% (Max 10) +5% (Max 12) Gear Durability Bonus:+3 EXP Bonus: +3% Duration: 30m (Duration can be extended to 60m by consuming multiple servings)

37359.name: Ivy Curtain
37359.description: A natural veil of trailing greenery.

37360.name: Luminous Wooden Loft
37360.description: All the fun of a regular wooden loft, now with built-in light fixtures!

37361.name: Riviera Swinging-door Counter
37361.description: Be advised not to let the doors of this handsome counter hit you on the way out, as many a barkeep can attest that they pack a punch for both buttocks.

37362.name: Ironworks Tool Set
37362.description: A set of Garlond Ironworks' finest instruments.

37363.name: Trick Bookshelf Partition
37363.description: Pull the correct tome from the shelf to trigger the hidden door. Perfect for bibliophiles with a secret agenda.

37364.name: Simple Arched Window
37364.description: An arched window lovely in its simplicity.

37365.name: Factory Pillar
37365.description: A rusted metal pillar with an uncanny resemblance to those found in the Copied Factory.

37366.name: Curved Marble Partition
37366.description: A gently curved, cream-colored partition with a white marble baseboard.

37367.name: Iron Chair
37367.description: A refined chair wrought with diligence.

37369.name: Steel Locker
37369.description: A metal cupboard perfectly suited for stowing cleaning instruments, sundry items, and lithographs of your sweetheart.

37370.name: Alpine Cabinet
37370.description: A decorative cabinet designed in the alpine style.

37371.name: Alpine Wall Lantern
37371.description: A wall lantern crafted in the alpine style.

37372.name: Astrologicum Star Map
37372.description: An august chart rich with the secrets of the heavens. Good for study and impressing your guests.

37373.name: Imitation Alpine Window
37373.description: Who needs a house in the freezing peaks when you can mount a frosty windowpane upon your wall instead?

37374.name: House Fortemps Fireplace
37374.description: A faithful replica of the fireplace found in Fortemps Manor.

37375.name: Alpine Doormat
37375.description: A welcome mat designed to complement alpine residences.

37376.name: Cathedral Lectern
37376.description: An uncanny recreation of the lectern used in Saint Reymanaud's Cathedral.

37377.name: Scholasticate Table
37377.description: A long desk much like those found at Saint Endalim's Scholasticate.

37378.name: Scholasticate Chair
37378.description: A wooden chair much like those found at Saint Endalim's Scholasticate.

37379.name: Scholasticate Bookshelf
37379.description: A laden bookshelf much like those found at Saint Endalim's Scholasticate.

37380.name: Bluefeather Astrolabos
37380.description: A hauntingly beautiful model of the universe.

37381.name: Royal Menagerie Phasmascape
37381.description: This advanced magitek contraption displays the splendor of Ala Mhigo's Royal Menagerie under a dying sun.

37382.name: Sea of Clouds Phasmascape
37382.description: This advanced magitek contraption displays the bevy of isles floating above Abalathia's Spine.

37397.name: Alpine Open-air Bath
37397.description: A luxurious, outdoor bath designed in the alpine fashion.

37398.name: Ivy-covered Bridge
37398.description: A stone bridge tastefully hemmed with tendrils of creeping ivy.

37399.name: Snowy Red Brick Bench
37399.description: Someone might have sat here, alone in the snow, thinking of warmer days since passed...

37400.name: Raised Wooden Deck
37400.description: An elevated platform designed for access by only those who dare to hop, skip, or jump.

37401.name: Garden Gate
37401.description: Curious what lies beyond the garden wall? The garden gate is here to help.

37402.name: Planter Set
37402.description: A vibrant arrangement of plant life bursting from a cluster of sturdy planters.

37403.name: Sweet Lawn Ornaments
37403.description: Giant, lifelike lawn ornaments that look tasty enough to lick. (Be advised that this item is for decorative purposes only and should not be licked or otherwise consumed under any circumstances.)

37404.name: Damaged Ishgardian Wall
37404.description: A damaged wall preserved for posterity during the Ishgardian Restoration.

37405.name: Ishgardian Lamppost
37405.description: A lamppost of steel such as one might see lining an Ishgardian street. Authentically frigid!

37408.name: Amaurotine Interior Wall
37408.description: An interior wall recreated from the memory of a city long since destroyed.

37409.name: Amaurotine Flooring
37409.description: Elegant stone flooring recreated from the memory of a city long since destroyed.

37410.name: Amaurotine Spire Chandelier
37410.description: A breathtaking light fixture resembling the once-proud spires of a city long since destroyed.

37411.name: The Map Unfolds Orchestrion Roll
37411.description: Music roll for The Map Unfolds. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37412.name: The Final Day Orchestrion Roll
37412.description: Music roll for The Final Day. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37413.name: With Hearts Aligned Orchestrion Roll
37413.description: Music roll for With Hearts Aligned. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37416.description: Music roll for Pilgrimage. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37417.description: Music roll for Radiance. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37418.description: Music roll for In the Balance. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37430.description: Music roll for Warming Up. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37431.name: Festival of the Hunt (Endwalker) Orchestrion Roll
37431.description: Music roll for Festival of the Hunt (Endwalker). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37432.name: Run! (Endwalker) Orchestrion Roll
37432.description: Music roll for Run! (Endwalker). Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37433.description: Music roll for Like a Summer Rain. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37434.description: Music roll for Descent. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37437.name: Starlight and Sellswords Orchestrion Roll
37437.description: Music roll for Starlight and Sellswords. Use to add to your orchestrion list.

37441.name: Faded Copy of The Final Day
37441.description: Timeworn pages of sheet music containing the full score for The Final Day.

37484.name: White Lace Parasol
37484.description: A frill-rimmed umbrella perfect for any weather except rain. Use to unlock a white lace parasol.

37485.name: Blue Blossom Parasol
37485.description: A white umbrella printed with a charming pattern of blue flowers, moogles, chocobos, and more. Use to unlock a blue blossom parasol.

37487.name: False Classic Spectacles
37487.description:
Wear these for a classic look of intelligence.*
* Glasses have no effect on actual intelligence. Generous bouts of silence may be advised. Use to unlock a pair of false classic spectacles.

37488.name: Exciting Fiber
37488.description: Synthetic material invented and woven by the Loporrits. The texture is exhilaratingly different on either side.

37489.name: Deep-sea Marble
37489.description: Stone pulled from the bottom of the Sirensong Sea.

37490.name: Driftseeds
37490.description: A myriad assortment of seeds harvested from natural flotsam.

37491.name: Resplendent Feather
37491.description: This highly collectable feather appears to be larger and more beautiful than that of any documented fauna.

37492.name: Blue Feather
37492.description: A feather the color of a deep night sky yearning for dawn.
